# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-104">機密情報の種類のエンティティ定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-105">コンプライアンスセンターのデータ損失防止 (DLP) には、DLP ポリシーで使用できる、さまざまな機密情報の種類が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-106">このトピックでは、機密情報の種類をすべて一覧表示し、各種類を検出したときに DLP ポリシーが調査する内容を示します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-107">機密情報の種類はパターンで定義され、正規表現または関数で識別できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-108">機密情報の種類はさらに、キーワードやチェックサムなどの確証的な証拠を使用して識別することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-109">また、評価プロセスでは信頼度や近接度も使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>
  
## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-110">ABA ルーティング番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-110">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-111">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-111">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-112">書式設定ありまたは書式設定なしの 9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-112">9 digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-113">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-113">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-114">さ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-114">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-115">0、1、2、3、6、7、または 8 で始まる 4 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-115">Four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-116">ハイフン 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-116">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-117">4 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-117">Four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-118">ハイフン 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-118">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-119">1 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-119">A digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-120">書式なし: 0、1、2、3、6、7、または8で始まる9桁の連続した数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-120">Unformatted: 9 consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-121">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-121">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-122">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-122">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-123">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-123">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-124">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-124">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-125">関数 Func_aba_routing がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-126">Keyword_ABA_Routing のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-126">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- ABA Routing Number -->
<Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-146">アルゼンチンの国民 id (DNI) 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-146">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-147">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-148">ピリオドで区切られた 8 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-148">Eight digits separated by periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-149">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-150">8 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-150">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-151">2 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-151">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-152">ピリオド 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-152">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-153">3 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-153">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-154">ピリオド 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-154">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-155">3 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-155">Three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-156">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-157">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-157">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-158">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-159">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-159">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-160">正規表現 Regex_argentina_national_id は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-160">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-161">Keyword_argentina_national_id からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-161">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_argentina_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-163">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-163">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-165">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-165">Identity</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-166">識別国の Id カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-166">Identification National Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-167">DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-167">DNI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-168">個人の NIC National レジストリ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-168">NIC National Registry of Persons</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-169">Documento Nacional de Identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-169">Documento Nacional de Identidad</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-170">Registro Nacional de las Personas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-170">Registro Nacional de las Personas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-171">Dad の識別子</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-171">Identidad</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-172">Identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-172">Identificación</span></span> 
   
## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-173">オーストラリアの銀行口座番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-173">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-174">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-175">銀行支店識別コード (BSB) を含むまたは含まない 6 ～ 10 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-175">6-10 digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-176">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-177">口座番号は 6 ～ 10 桁の数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-177">Account number is 6-10 digits.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-178">オーストラリアの銀行の州支店番号:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-178">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-179">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-179">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-180">ハイフン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-180">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-181">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-181">Three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-182">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-182">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-183">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-183">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-184">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-184">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-185">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-185">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-186">正規表現 Regex_australia_bank_account_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-186">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-187">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-187">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-188">正規表現 Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-188">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-189">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-189">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-190">正規表現 Regex_australia_bank_account_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-190">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-191">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-191">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-205">full names</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-205">full names</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-206">iaea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-206">iaea</span></span>

   
## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-207">オーストラリアの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-207">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-208">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-208">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-209">9 桁の文字と数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-209">Nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-210">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-210">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-211">9 つの文字と数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-211">Nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-212">2 つの数字または文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-212">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-213">2 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-213">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-214">5 つの数字または文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-214">Five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-215">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-215">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-216">1 ～ 2 桁の省略可能な文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-216">1-2 optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-217">4 ～ 9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-217">4-9 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-218">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-218">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-219">9 桁の数字または文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-219">Nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-220">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-220">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-221">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-221">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-222">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-222">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-223">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-223">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-224">正規表現 Regex_australia_drivers_license_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-224">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-225">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-225">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-226">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions のキーワードを検出しなかった。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-226">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-326">オーストラリアの医療口座番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-326">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-327">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-328">10 ～ 11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-328">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-329">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-330">10 ～ 11 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-330">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-331">最初の桁は 2 ～ 6 のいずれか</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-331">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-332">9 桁目はチェック ディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-332">Ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-333">10 桁目は発行桁</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-333">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-334">11 桁目 (省略可能) は個人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-334">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-335">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-336">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-336">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-337">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-337">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-338">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-338">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-339">関数 Func_australian_medical_account_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-339">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-340">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-340">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-341">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-341">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-353">オーストラリアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-353">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-354">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-354">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-355">1 桁の文字の後に 7 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-355">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-356">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-356">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-357">1 桁の文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし) の後に 7 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-357">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-358">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-358">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-359">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-359">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-360">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-360">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-361">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-361">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-362">正規表現 Regex_australia_passport_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-362">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-363">Keyword_passport または Keyword_australia_passport_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-363">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-397">オーストラリアの税ファイル番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-397">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-398">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-399">8 ～ 9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-399">8-9 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-400">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-401">8 ～ 9 桁の数字。通常は次のようにスペースが含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-401">8-9 digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-402">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-402">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-403">省略可能なスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-403">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-404">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-404">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-405">省略可能なスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-405">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-406">2 ～ 3 桁の数字。最後の桁はチェック ディジット用です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-406">2-3 digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-407">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-407">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-408">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-408">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-409">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-409">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-410">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-410">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-411">関数 Func_australian_tax_file_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-411">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-412">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number または Keyword_number_exclusions のキーワードを検出しなかった。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-412">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-413">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-413">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-418">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-418">medicare levy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-419">portfolio number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-419">portfolio number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-455">9999999999</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-455">9999999999</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-456">オーストリアドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-456">Austria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-457">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-457">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-458">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-458">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-459">スペースと区切り文字を含まない8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-459">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-460">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-460">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-461">8 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-461">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-462">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-462">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-463">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-463">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-464">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-464">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-465">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-465">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-466">正規表現は、 `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-466">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-467">From キーワード `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-467">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-468">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-468">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-469">**Keywords_austria_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-469">**Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-470">dl#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-470">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-471">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-471">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-472">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-472">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-473">ドライバーのライセンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-473">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-474">ドライバー lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-474">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-475">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-475">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-476">driver's licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-476">driver's licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-477">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-477">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-478">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-478">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-479">ドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-479">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-480">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-480">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-481">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-481">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-482">futex</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-482">fuhrerschein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-483">futex (futex) republik osterreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-483">fuhrerschein republik osterreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-484">オーストリア国立識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-484">Austria national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-485">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-485">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-486">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-486">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-487">24文字の文字、数字、特殊文字の組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-487">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-488">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-488">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-489">24文字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-489">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-490">22文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)、数字、円記号、スラッシュ、またはプラス記号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-490">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-491">2つの文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)、数字、バックスラッシュ、スラッシュ、プラス記号、または等号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-491">Two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-492">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-492">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-493">該当しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-493">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-494">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-494">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-495">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-495">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-496">正規表現は、 `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-496">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-497">From キーワード `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-497">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
<!-- EU austria_eu_national_id -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-498">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-498">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-499">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-499">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-500">id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-500">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-501">
national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-501">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-502">personalausweis republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-502">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-503">オーストリアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-503">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-504">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号 sensitiveinformation タイプでのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-504">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-505">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-505">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-506">1文字の後にオプションのスペースと7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-506">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-507">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-507">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-508">1つの文字、7桁の数字、および1つのスペースの組み合わせ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-508">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-509">1 文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-509">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-510">スペース1つ (オプション)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-510">One space (optional)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-511">7 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-511">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-512">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-513">該当しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-513">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-514">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-515">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-515">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-516">正規表現は、 `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-516">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-517">From キーワード `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-517">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-518">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-518">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-519">**Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-519">**Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-520">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-520">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-521">オーストリアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-521">austrian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-522">passport いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-522">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-523">reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-523">reisepass</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-524">österreichisch reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-524">österreichisch reisepass</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-525">オーストリアの社会保障番号または同等の id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-525">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-526">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 社会保障番号または同等の ID の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-526">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-527">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-527">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-528">指定した形式の10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-528">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-529">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-529">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-530">10 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-530">10 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-531">シリアル番号に対応する3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-531">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-532">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-532">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-533">誕生日に対応する6桁の数字 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-533">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-534">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-534">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-535">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-535">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-536">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-536">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-537">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-537">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-538">関数は、 `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-538">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-539">From キーワード `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-539">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-540">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-540">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-541">関数は、 `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-541">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-542">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-542">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-543">Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-543">Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-544">ソーシャルセキュリティなし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-544">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-545">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-545">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-546">social security code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-546">social security code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-547">保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-547">insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-548">オーストリア ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-548">austrian ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-549">ssn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-549">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-550">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-550">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-551">保険コード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-551">insurance code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-552">保険コード#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-552">insurance code#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-553">"社会 securityno"#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-553">socialsecurityno#</span></span>

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-557">オーストリアの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-557">Austria tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-558">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務 ID 番号の機密情報の種類のみ利用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-558">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Tax ID number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-559">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-559">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-560">任意指定のハイフンとスラッシュ (/) を含む9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-560">Nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-561">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-561">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-562">任意指定のハイフンとスラッシュ (/) を含む9桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-562">Nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-563">2 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-563">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-564">ハイフン (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-564">A hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-565">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-565">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-566">スラッシュ (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-566">A forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-567">4 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-567">Four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-568">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-568">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-569">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-569">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-570">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-570">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-571">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-571">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-572">関数は、 `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-572">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-573">From キーワード `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-573">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-574">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-574">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-575">関数は、 `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-575">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-598">Azure DocumentDB 認証キー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-598">Azure DocumentDB Auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-599">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-599">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-600">文字列 "DocumentDb" の後に、次のパターンで概説されている文字と文字列が続きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-600">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-601">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-601">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-602">文字列 "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-602">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-603">3-200 の小文字または大文字、数字、記号、特殊文字、スペースのいずれかの組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-603">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-604">より大きい記号 (>)、等号 (=)、引用符 (")、またはアポストロフィ (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-604">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-605">86の小文字または小文字、数字、スラッシュ (/)、またはプラス記号 (+) の任意の組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-605">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-606">2つの等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-606">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-607">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-607">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-608">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-608">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-609">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-609">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-610">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-610">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-611">正規表現 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-611">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-612">正規表現 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出し**ません**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-612">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-615">(この機密情報の種類では、キーワードリストではなく正規表現を使用してこれらのキーワードを識別していることに注意してください)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-615">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-620">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-620">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-621">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-621">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-622">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-622">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-623">testacs。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-623">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-624">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-624">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-625">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-625">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-626">ネット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-626">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-627">Azure IAAS データベースの接続文字列と Azure SQL 接続文字列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-627">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-628">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-628">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-629">文字列 "Server"、"server"、または "data source" の後に、次のパターンで概説されている文字と文字列を指定します (文字列 "cloudapp" を含む)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-629">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-630">com または "cloudapp azure。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-630">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-631">net "または" database "です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-631">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-632">net "、および" Password "または" pwd "という文字列を指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-632">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-633">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-633">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-634">文字列 "Server"、"server"、または "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-634">The string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-635">0-2 空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-635">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-636">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-636">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-637">0-2 空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-637">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-638">1-200 の小文字または大文字、数字、記号、特殊文字、スペースのいずれかの組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-638">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-639">文字列 "cloudapp。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-639">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-640">com "," cloudapp。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-640">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-641">net "、または" database "です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-641">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-642">ネット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-642">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-643">1-300 の小文字または大文字、数字、記号、特殊文字、スペースのいずれかの組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-643">Any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-644">文字列 "Password"、"password"、または "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-644">The string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-645">0-2 空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-645">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-646">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-646">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-647">0-2 空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-647">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-648">セミコロンではない1つ以上の文字 (;)、引用符 (")、またはアポストロフィ (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-648">One or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-649">セミコロン (;)、引用符 (")、またはアポストロフィ (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-649">A semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-650">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-650">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-651">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-651">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-652">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-652">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-653">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-653">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-654">正規表現 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-654">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-655">正規表現 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出し**ません**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-655">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-656">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-656">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-670">Azure IoT 接続文字列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-670">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-671">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-671">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-672">文字列 "HostName" の後に、次のパターンで概説されている文字と文字列 ("azure デバイス" を含む)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-672">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-673">net "および" SharedAccessKey "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-673">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-674">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-674">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-675">文字列 "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-675">The string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-676">0-2 空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-676">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-677">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-677">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-678">0-2 空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-678">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-679">1-200 の小文字または大文字、数字、記号、特殊文字、スペースのいずれかの組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-679">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-680">文字列 "azure デバイス。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-680">The string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-681">ネット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-681">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-682">1-200 の小文字または大文字、数字、記号、特殊文字、スペースのいずれかの組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-682">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-683">文字列 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-683">The string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-684">0-2 空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-684">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-685">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-685">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-686">0-2 空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-686">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-687">43の小文字または小文字、数字、スラッシュ (/)、またはプラス記号 (+) の任意の組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-687">Any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-688">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-688">An equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-689">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-689">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-690">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-690">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-691">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-691">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-692">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-692">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-693">正規表現 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-693">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-694">正規表現 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出し**ません**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-694">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-700">ノース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-700">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-701">サンド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-701">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-702">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-702">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-703">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-703">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-704">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-704">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-705">testacs。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-705">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-706">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-706">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-707">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-707">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-708">ネット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-708">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-709">Azure 発行設定パスワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-709">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-710">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-710">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-711">文字列 "userpwd =" に続けて英数字の文字列を指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-711">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-712">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-712">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-713">文字列 "userpwd ="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-713">The string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-714">60小文字または数字の任意の組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-714">Any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-715">二重引用符 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-715">A quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-716">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-716">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-717">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-717">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-718">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-718">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-719">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-719">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-720">正規表現 CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-720">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-721">正規表現 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出し**ません**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-721">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-736">Azure Redis cache 接続文字列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-736">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-737">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-737">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-738">文字列 "redis...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-738">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-739">net "の後に、次のパターンで概説されている文字と文字列を指定します。文字列" password "または" pwd "が含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-739">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-740">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-740">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-741">文字列 "redis...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-741">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-742">ネット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-742">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-743">1-200 の小文字または大文字、数字、記号、特殊文字、スペースのいずれかの組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-743">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-744">文字列 "password" または "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-744">The string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-745">0-2 空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-745">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-746">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-746">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-747">0-2 空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-747">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-748">43文字の任意の組み合わせ (小文字または大文字の文字、数字、スラッシュ (/)、プラス記号 (+))</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-748">Any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-749">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-749">An equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-750">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-750">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-751">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-751">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-752">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-752">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-753">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-753">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-754">正規表現 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-754">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-755">正規表現 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出し**ません**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-755">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-757">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-757">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-758">(この機密情報の種類では、キーワードリストではなく正規表現を使用してこれらのキーワードを識別していることに注意してください)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-758">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-760">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-760">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-761">ノース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-761">northwind</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-765">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-765">127.0.0.1</span></span>
