- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-768">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-768">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-769">ネット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-769">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-770">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-770">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-771">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-771">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-772">文字列 "sig" の後に、次のパターンで概説されている文字と文字列が続きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-772">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-773">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-773">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-774">文字列 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-774">The string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-775">0-2 空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-775">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-776">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-776">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-777">0-2 空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-777">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-778">43-53 文字のうち、下位または大文字の文字、数字、またはパーセント記号 (%) の任意の組み合わせ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-778">Any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-779">文字列 "% 3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-779">The string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-780">小文字または大文字、数字、パーセント記号 (%) 以外の文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-780">Any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-781">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-781">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-782">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-782">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-783">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-783">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-784">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-784">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-785">正規表現 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-785">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-786">Azure Service Bus の接続文字列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-786">Azure Service Bus Connection String</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-787">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-787">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-788">文字列 "EndPoint" の後に、次のパターンで概説されている文字と文字列が続きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-788">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-789">net "および" Shared' キー "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-789">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-790">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-790">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-791">文字列 "EndPoint"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-791">The string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-792">0-2 空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-792">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-793">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-793">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-794">0-2 空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-794">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-795">1-200 の小文字または大文字、数字、記号、特殊文字、スペースのいずれかの組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-795">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-796">文字列 "windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-796">The string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-797">ネット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-797">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-798">1-200 の小文字または大文字、数字、記号、特殊文字、スペースのいずれかの組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-798">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-799">文字列 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-799">The string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-800">0-2 空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-800">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-801">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-801">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-802">0-2 空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-802">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-803">43文字の任意の組み合わせ (小文字または大文字の文字、数字、スラッシュ (/)、プラス記号 (+))</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-803">Any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-804">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-804">An equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-805">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-805">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-806">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-806">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-807">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-807">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-808">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-808">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-809">正規表現 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-809">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-810">正規表現 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出し**ません**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-810">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-823">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-823">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-824">ネット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-824">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-825">Azure ストレージアカウントキー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-825">Azure Storage Account Key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-826">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-826">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-827">文字列 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" の後に、文字列 "AccountKey" を含む、次のパターンで概説されている文字および文字列が続きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-827">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-828">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-828">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-829">文字列 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-829">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-830">0-2 空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-830">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-831">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-831">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-832">0-2 空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-832">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-833">1-200 の小文字または大文字、数字、記号、特殊文字、スペースのいずれかの組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-833">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-834">文字列 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-834">The string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-835">0-2 空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-835">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-836">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-836">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-837">0-2 空白文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-837">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-838">86文字の任意の組み合わせ (小文字または大文字の文字、数字、スラッシュ (/)、プラス記号 (+))</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-838">Any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-839">2つの等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-839">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-840">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-840">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-841">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-841">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-842">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-842">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-843">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-843">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-844">正規表現 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-844">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-845">正規表現 CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出し**ません**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-845">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-846">正規表現 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出し**ません**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-846">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-852">(この機密情報の種類では、キーワードリストではなく正規表現を使用してこれらのキーワードを識別していることに注意してください)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-852">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-856">サンド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-856">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-857">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-857">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-858">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-858">localhost</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-864">Azure ストレージアカウントキー (汎用)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-864">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-865">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-866">86の下または大文字、数字、スラッシュ (/)、またはプラス記号 (+) の任意の組み合わせで、下のパターンで説明されている文字が前または後にある。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-866">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-867">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-867">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-868">0-1 より大きい記号 (>)、アポストロフィ (')、等号 (=)、引用符 (")、または番号記号 (#) を指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-868">0-1 of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-869">86文字の任意の組み合わせ (小文字または大文字の文字、数字、スラッシュ (/)、プラス記号 (+))</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-869">Any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-870">2つの等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-870">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-871">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-871">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-872">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-872">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-873">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-873">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-874">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-874">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-875">正規表現 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-875">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-876">ベルギーの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-876">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-877">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-877">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-878">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-878">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-879">スペースと区切り文字を含まない10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-879">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-880">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-880">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-881">10 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-881">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-882">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-882">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-883">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-883">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-884">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-884">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-885">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-885">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-886">正規表現は、 `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-886">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-887">From キーワード `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-887">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-908">futex の eh/nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-908">fuehrerschein- nr</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-909">ベルギーの国番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-909">Belgium national number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-910">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類に含まれており、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-910">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-911">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-911">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-912">11 の数字と区切り文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-912">11 digits plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-913">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-913">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-914">11 の数字と区切り文字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-914">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-915">YY.MM.DD の形式の生年月日を表す 6 桁の数字と 2 つピリオド </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-915">Six digits and two periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-916">ハイフン 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-916">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-917">3 桁の連番 (男性の場合は奇数、女性の場合は偶数) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-917">Three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-918">ピリオド 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-918">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-919">チェック ディジットとして機能する 2 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-919">Two digits that are a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-920">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-920">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-921">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-921">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-922">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-922">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-923">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-923">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-924">関数 Func_belgium_national_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-924">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-925">Keyword_belgium_national_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-925">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-926">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-926">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
  <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-985">ベルギーのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-985">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-986">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-986">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-987">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-987">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-988">2つの文字の後に6桁の数字 (スペースまたは区切り記号を付けない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-988">Two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-989">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-989">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-990">2つの文字の後に6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-990">Two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-991">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-991">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-992">該当しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-992">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-993">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-993">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-994">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-994">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-995">正規表現は、 `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-995">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-996">From キーワード `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-996">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium__eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-997">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-997">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-998">**Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-998">**Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-999">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-999">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1000">ベルギーのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1000">belgian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1001">passport いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1001">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1002">大き poort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1002">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1003">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1003">paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1004">reisepass kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1004">reisepass kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1005">reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1005">reisepass</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1006">ベルギーの社会保障番号または同等の id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1006">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1007">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 社会保障番号または同等の ID の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1007">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1008">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1008">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1009">11桁の数字 (スペースまたは区切り文字なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1009">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1010">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1010">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1011">11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1011">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1012">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1012">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1013">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1013">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1014">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1014">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1015">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1015">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1016">関数は、 `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1016">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1017">From キーワード `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1017">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1018">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1018">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1019">関数は、 `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1019">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1039">ベルギーの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1039">Belgium tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1040">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 納税者番号機密情報の種類にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1040">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1041">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1041">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1042">スペースと区切り文字を含まない11桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1042">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1043">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1043">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1044">11 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1044">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1045">2 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1045">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1046">"0" または "1"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1046">A "0" or "1"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1047">1 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1047">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1048">"0" または "1" または "2" または "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1048">A "0" or "1" or "2" or "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1049">6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1049">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1050">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1050">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1051">該当しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1051">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1052">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1052">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1053">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1053">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1054">正規表現は、 `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1054">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1055">From キーワード `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1055">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1114">ブラジルの CPF 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1114">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1115">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1115">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1116">書式設定ありまたは書式設定なしのチェック ディジットを含む 11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1116">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1117">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1117">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1118">さ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1118">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1119">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1119">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1120">ピリオド 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1120">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1121">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1121">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1122">ピリオド 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1122">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1123">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1123">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1124">ハイフン 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1124">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1125">チェック ディジットとして機能する 2 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1125">Two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1126">なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1126">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1127">11 桁の数字 (最後の 2 桁はチェック ディジット)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1127">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1128">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1128">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1129">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1129">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1130">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1130">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1131">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1131">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1132">関数 Func_brazil_cpf は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1132">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1133">Keyword_brazil_cpf からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1133">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1134">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1134">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1135">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1135">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1136">関数 Func_brazil_cpf は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1136">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1137">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1137">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1138">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1138">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1139">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1139">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1140">CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1140">CPF</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1141">Fim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1141">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1142">Registration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1142">Registration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1143">増大</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1143">Revenue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1144">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1144">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1145">Imposto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1145">Imposto</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1146">Identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1146">Identificação</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1147">Inscrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1147">Inscrição</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1148">Receita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1148">Receita</span></span> 
   
## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1149">ブラジルの法人番号 (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1149">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1150">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1151">登録番号、枝番号、チェック ディジット、および区切り文字を含む 14 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1151">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1152">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1152">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1153">14 桁の数字と区切り文字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1153">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1154">2 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1154">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1155">ピリオド 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1155">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1156">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1156">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1157">ピリオド 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1157">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1158">3 桁の数字 (最初の 8 桁の数字は登録番号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1158">Three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1159">スラッシュ 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1159">A forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1160">4 桁の枝番号 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1160">Four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1161">ハイフン 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1161">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1162">チェック ディジットとして機能する 2 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1162">Two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1163">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1163">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1164">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1164">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1165">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1165">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1166">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1166">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1167">関数 Func_brazil_cnpj は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1167">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1168">Keyword_brazil_cnpj からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1168">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1169">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1169">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1170">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1170">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1171">関数 Func_brazil_cnpj は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1171">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1172">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1172">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1187">Cadastro Geral de Contribuintes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1187">Cadastro Geral de Contribuintes</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1194">ブラジルの国民識別カード (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1194">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1195">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1195">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1196">Registro Geral (古い形式): 9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1196">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1197">Registro de 識別子 Dade (RIC) (新しい形式):11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1197">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1198">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1198">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1199">Registro Geral (従来の形式):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1199">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1200">2 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1200">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1201">ピリオド 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1201">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1202">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1202">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1203">ピリオド 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1203">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1204">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1204">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1205">ハイフン 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1205">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1206">チェック ディジットとして機能する 1 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1206">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1207">Registro de 識別子 Dade (RIC) (新しい形式):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1207">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1208">10 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1208">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1209">ハイフン 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1209">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1210">チェック ディジットとして機能する 1 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1210">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1211">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1211">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1212">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1212">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1213">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1213">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1214">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1214">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1215">関数 Func_brazil_rg は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1215">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1216">Keyword_brazil_rg からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1216">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1217">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1217">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1218">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1218">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1219">関数 Func_brazil_rg は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1219">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1220">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1221">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1221">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1222">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1222">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1223">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1223">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1224">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1224">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1225">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1225">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1226">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1226">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1227">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1227">registro de Iidentidade</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1228">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1228">registro geral</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1229">RG (このキーワードでは大文字と小文字が区別されます)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1229">RG (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1230">RIC (このキーワードでは大文字と小文字が区別されます)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1230">RIC (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1231">ブルガリアの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1231">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1232">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1232">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1233">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1233">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1234">スペースと区切り文字を含まない9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1234">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1235">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1235">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1236">9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1236">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1237">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1237">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1238">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1238">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1239">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1239">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1240">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1240">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1241">正規表現は、 `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1241">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1242">From キーワード `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1242">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1261">ブルガリア国家識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1261">Bulgaria national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1262">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1262">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1263">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1263">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1264">スペースと区切り文字を含まない10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1264">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1265">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1265">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1266">スペースと区切り文字を含まない10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1266">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1267">誕生日に対応する6桁の数字 (YYMMDD という)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1267">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1268">誕生日の順序に対応する2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1268">Two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1269">性別に対応する1桁の数字: 男性の偶数桁で、女性に奇数の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1269">One digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1270">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1270">One check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1271">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1271">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1272">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1272">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1273">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1273">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1274">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1274">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1275">関数は、 `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1275">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1276">From キーワード `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1276">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1277">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1277">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1278">関数は、 `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1278">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1323">ブルガリアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1323">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1324">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1324">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1325">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1325">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1326">スペースと区切り文字を含まない9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1326">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1327">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1327">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1328">9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1328">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1329">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1329">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1330">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1330">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1331">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1331">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1332">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1332">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1333">正規表現は、 `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1333">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1334">From キーワード `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1334">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1335">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1335">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1336">**Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1336">**Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1337">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1337">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1338">ブルガリアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1338">bulgarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1339">passport いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1339">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1340">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1340">номер на паспорта</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1341">ブルガリア税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1341">Bulgaria tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1342">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務識別番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1342">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1343">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1343">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1344">スペースと区切り文字を含まない10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1344">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1345">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1345">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1346">10 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1346">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1347">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1347">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1348">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1348">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1349">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1349">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1350">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1350">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1351">関数は、 `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1351">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1352">From キーワード `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1352">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1353">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1353">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1354">関数は、 `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1354">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1399">カナダの銀行口座番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1399">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1400">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1400">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1401">7 桁または 12 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1401">Seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1402">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1402">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1403">カナダの銀行口座番号は 7 桁または 12 桁の数字です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1403">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1404">カナダの銀行口座転送番号は次のとおりです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1404">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1405">5 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1405">Five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1406">ハイフン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1406">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1407">3桁の数字または</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1407">Three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1408">1 桁のゼロ (0) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1408">A zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1409">8 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1409">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1410">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1410">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1411">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1411">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1412">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1412">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1413">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1413">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1414">正規表現 Regex_canada_bank_account_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1414">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1415">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1415">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1416">正規表現 Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1416">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1417">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1417">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1418">正規表現 Regex_canada_bank_account_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1418">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1419">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1419">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1443">カナダの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1443">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1444">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1444">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1445">州によって異なります</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1445">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1446">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1446">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1447">アルバータ州、ブリティッシュ コロンビア州、マニトバ州、ニュー ブランズウィック州、ニューファンドランド・ラブラドール州、ノバスコシア州、オンタリオ州、プリンス エドワード アイランド州、ケベック州、およびサスカチュワン州の各種パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1447">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1448">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1448">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1449">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1449">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1450">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1450">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1451">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1451">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1452">関数 Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1452">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1453">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1453">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1454">Keyword_canada_drivers_license のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1454">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
