## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1590">カナダの正常性サービス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1590">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1591">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1591">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1592">10 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1592">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1593">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1593">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1594">10 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1594">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1595">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1595">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1596">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1596">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1597">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1597">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1598">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1598">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1599">正規表現 Regex_canada_health_service_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1599">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1600">Keyword_canada_health_service_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1600">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1601">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1601">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_health_service_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1602">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1602">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1603">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1603">personal health number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1604">patient information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1604">patient information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1605">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1605">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1606">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1606">speciality services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1607">automobile accident</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1607">automobile accident</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1608">patient hospital</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1608">patient hospital</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1609">psychiatrist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1609">psychiatrist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1610">workers compensation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1610">workers compensation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1611">身体</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1611">disability</span></span>
      
## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1612">カナダのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1612">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1613">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1613">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1614">2 桁の大文字の後に 6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1614">Two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1615">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1615">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1616">2 桁の大文字の後に 6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1616">Two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1617">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1617">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1618">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1618">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1619">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1619">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1620">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1620">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1621">正規表現 Regex_canada_passport_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1621">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1622">Keyword_canada_passport_number または Keyword_passport からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1622">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1623">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1623">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1626">canadian passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1626">canadian passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1628">passport photos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1628">passport photos</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1629">certified translator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1629">certified translator</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1630">canadian citizens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1630">canadian citizens</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1631">processing times</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1631">processing times</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1632">renewal application</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1632">renewal application</span></span>

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1652">カナダの個人正常性識別番号 (PHIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1652">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1653">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1653">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1654">9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1654">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1655">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1655">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1656">9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1656">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1657">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1657">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1658">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1658">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1659">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1659">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1660">DLP ポリシーは75% です。この種類の機密情報は、近接する300文字の中で検出されます。正規表現 Regex_canada_phin は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1660">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1661">Keyword_canada_phin または Keyword_canada_provinces から少なくとも2つのキーワードが見つかります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1661">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found..</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1694">カナダの社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1694">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1695">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1696">9 桁の数字と省略可能なハイフンまたはスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1696">Nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1697">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1698">さ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1698">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1699">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1699">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1700">ハイフンまたはスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1700">A hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1701">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1701">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1702">ハイフンまたはスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1702">A hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1703">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1703">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1704">書式なし: 9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1704">Unformatted: Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1705">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1705">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1706">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1706">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1707">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1707">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1708">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1708">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1709">関数 Func_canadian_sin がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1709">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1710">以下の 2 つ以上の条件に該当する:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1710">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1711">Keyword_sin のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1711">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1712">Keyword_sin_collaborative のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1712">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1713">関数 Func_eu_date が適切な日付形式の日付を検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1713">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1714">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1714">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1715">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1715">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1716">関数 Func_unformatted_canadian_sin がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1716">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1717">Keyword_sin のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1717">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1718">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1718">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1719">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1719">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1724">大罪</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1724">sins</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1726">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1726">ssns</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1728">numero d'assurance social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1728">numero d'assurance social</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1729">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1729">national identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1730">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1730">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1731">sin#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1731">sin#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1732">soc ins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1732">soc ins</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1733">social ins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1733">social ins</span></span> 

#### <a name="keyword_sin_collaborative"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1734">Keyword_sin_collaborative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1734">Keyword_sin_collaborative</span></span>

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1743">チリ id カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1743">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1744">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1745">7-8 桁の数字と区切り文字のチェックディジットまたは文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1745">7-8 digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1746">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1747">7 ～ 8 桁の数字と区切り文字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1747">7-8 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1748">1 ～ 2 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1748">1-2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1749">ピリオド 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1749">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1750">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1750">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1751">ピリオド 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1751">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1752">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1752">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1753">ハイフン 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1753">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1754">チェック ディジットとして機能する 1 桁の数字または文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1754">One digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1755">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1755">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1756">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1756">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1757">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1757">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1758">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1758">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1759">関数 Func_chile_id_card は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1759">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1760">Keyword_chile_id_card からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1760">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1761">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1761">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1762">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1762">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1763">関数 Func_chile_id_card は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1763">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1764">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1764">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1779">中国の居住アイデンティティカード (PRC) 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1779">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1780">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1781">18 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1781">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1782">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1783">18 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1783">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1784">住所コードを表す 6 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1784">Six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1785">YYYYMMDD の形式で生年月日を表す 8 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1785">Eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1786">順序コードを表す 3 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1786">Three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1787">チェック ディジットとして機能する 1 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1787">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1788">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1789">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1789">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1790">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1791">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1791">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1792">関数 Func_china_resident_id は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1792">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1793">Keyword_china_resident_id からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1793">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1794">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1794">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1795">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1795">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1796">関数 Func_china_resident_id は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1796">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1797">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1797">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1799">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1799">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1802">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1802">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1803">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1803">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1804">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1804">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1805">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1805">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1806">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1806">鉴定</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1808">居民 身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1808">居民 身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1809">鑑定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1809">鑑定</span></span> 
   
## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1810">クレジット カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1810">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1811">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1811">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1812">書式設定または書式設定なし (dddddddddddddddd) で、Luhn テストに合格する必要がある14から16桁の数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1812">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1813">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1813">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1814">世界規模の主要ブランドのカード (Visa、MasterCard、Discover Card、JCB、American Express、ギフト カード、Dinars Club Card など) を検出する非常に複雑で信頼性の高いパターンです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1814">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1815">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1815">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1816">あり (Luhn のチェックサム)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1816">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1817">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1817">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1818">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1818">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1819">関数 Func_credit_card がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1819">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1820">次のいずれかの条件に該当する:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1820">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1821">Keyword_cc_verification のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1821">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1822">Keyword_cc_name からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1822">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1823">関数 Func_expiration_date が適切な日付形式の日付を検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1823">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1824">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1824">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1825">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1825">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1826">関数 Func_credit_card がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1826">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-1827">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-1827">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2033">クロアチアの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2033">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2034">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2034">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2035">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2035">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2036">スペースと区切り文字を含まない8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2036">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2037">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2037">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2038">8 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2038">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2039">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2039">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2040">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2040">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2041">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2041">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2042">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2042">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2043">正規表現は、 `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2043">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2044">From キーワード `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2044">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2045">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2045">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2046">**Keywords_croatia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2046">**Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2048">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2048">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2049">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2049">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2050">ドライバーのライセンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2050">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2051">ドライバー lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2051">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2054">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2054">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2055">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2055">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2056">ドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2056">driver's licence number</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2060">クロアチアの id カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2060">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2061">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類に含まれており、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2061">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2062">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2062">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2063">9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2063">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2064">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2064">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2065">9 桁の連続する数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2065">Nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2066">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2066">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2067">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2067">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2068">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2068">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2069">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2069">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2070">関数 Func_croatia_id_card は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2070">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2071">Keyword_croatia_id_card からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2071">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2072">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2072">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_croatia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2073">Keyword_croatia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2073">Keyword_croatia_id_card</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2102">クロアチアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2102">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2103">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2103">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2104">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2104">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2105">スペースと区切り文字を含まない9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2105">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2106">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2106">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2107">9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2107">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2108">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2108">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2109">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2109">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2110">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2110">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2111">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2111">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2112">正規表現は、 `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2112">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2113">From キーワード `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2113">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2114">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2114">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2115">**Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2115">**Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2116">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2116">passport number</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2120">クロアチア個人識別 (OIB) 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2120">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2121">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2121">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2122">11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2122">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2123">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2123">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2124">11 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2124">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2125">10 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2125">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2126">最終桁は、国際的なデータ交換のためのチェックディジットです。 HR は11桁の数字の前に追加されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2126">Final digit is a check digit For the purposes of international data exchange, the letters HR are added preceding the eleven digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2127">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2127">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2128">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2128">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2129">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2129">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2130">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2130">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2131">関数 Func_croatia_oib_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2131">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2132">Keyword_croatia_oib_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2132">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_oib_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2133">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2133">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2134">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2134">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2135">関数 Func_croatia_oib_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2135">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2136">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2136">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
<Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2137">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2137">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_croatia_oib_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2138">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2138">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2139">Personal Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2139">Personal Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2140">Osobni identifikacijski broj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2140">Osobni identifikacijski broj</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2141">OIB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2141">OIB</span></span> 

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2142">クロアチアの社会保障番号または同等の id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2142">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2143">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 社会保障番号または同等の ID の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2143">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2144">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2144">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2145">スペースと区切り文字を含まない11桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2145">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2146">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2146">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2147">11 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2147">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2148">10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2148">Ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2149">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2149">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2150">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2150">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2151">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2151">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2152">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2152">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2153">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2153">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2154">関数は、 `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2154">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2155">From キーワード `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2155">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2156">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2156">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2157">関数は、 `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2157">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2174">クロアチア税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2174">Croatia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2175">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 納税者番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2175">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2176">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2176">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2177">スペースまたは区切り文字を含まない11桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2177">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2178">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2178">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2179">11 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2179">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2180">ランダムに選択された10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2180">Ten digits, randomly chosen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2181">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2181">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2182">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2182">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2183">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2183">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2184">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2184">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2185">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2185">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2186">関数は、 `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2186">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2187">From キーワード `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2187">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2188">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2188">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2189">関数は、 `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2189">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2199">osobni id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2199">osobni id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2203">porezni identifikacijski broj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2203">porezni identifikacijski broj</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2204">tax id
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2204">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2205">税 id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2205">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2206">税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2206">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2207">課税番号#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2207">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2208">課税番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2208">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2209">課税番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2209">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2210">税務登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2210">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2211">taxid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2211">taxid#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2213">taxidnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2213">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2214">taxno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2214">taxno#</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2220">キプロス drivers ライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2220">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2221">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2221">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2222">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2222">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2223">12桁の数字 (スペースと区切り記号なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2223">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2224">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2224">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2225">12 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2225">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2226">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2226">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2227">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2227">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2228">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2228">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2229">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2229">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2230">正規表現は、 `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2230">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2231">From キーワード `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2231">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2233">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2233">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2235">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2235">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2236">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2236">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2237">ドライバーのライセンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2237">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2238">ドライバー lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2238">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2239">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2239">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2240">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2240">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2241">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2241">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2242">ドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2242">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2243">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2243">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2246">キプロス国立識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2246">Cyprus national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2247">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2247">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2248">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2248">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2249">スペースと区切り文字を含まない10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2249">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2250">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2250">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2251">10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2251">Ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2252">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2252">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2253">該当しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2253">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2254">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2254">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2255">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2255">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2256">正規表現は、 `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2256">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2257">From キーワード `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2257">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2259">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2259">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2266">キプロスパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2266">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2267">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2267">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2268">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2269">1文字の後に、スペースまたは区切り記号を含まない6-8 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2269">One letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2270">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2270">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2271">1文字の後に6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2271">One letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2272">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2272">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2273">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2273">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2274">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2274">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2275">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2275">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2276">正規表現は、 `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2276">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2277">From キーワード `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2277">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2278">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2278">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2279">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2279">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2280">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2280">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2281">キプロスパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2281">cyprus passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2282">passport いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2282">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2283">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2283">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2284">キプロス税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2284">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2285">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務識別番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2285">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2286">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2286">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2287">指定したパターンの8桁の数字と1文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2287">Eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2288">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2288">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2289">8桁の数字と1つの文字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2289">Eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2290">"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2290">A "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2291">7 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2291">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2292">1文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2292">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2293">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2293">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2294">該当しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2294">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2295">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2295">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2296">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2296">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2297">関数は、 `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2297">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2298">From キーワード `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2298">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2299">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2299">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2300">関数は、 `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2300">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2301">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2301">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2302">Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2302">Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2303">tax id
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2303">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2304">税 id コード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2304">tax identification code</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2308">課税番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2308">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2309">課税番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2309">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2310">税務登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2310">tax registration number</span></span>
