- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2315">taxnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2315">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2316">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2316">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2317">認め#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2317">tic#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2318">認め</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2318">tic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2319">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2319">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2320">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2320">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2321">は#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2321">tin#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2322">vergi kimlik/du du</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2322">vergi kimlik kodu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2323">vergi kimlik numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2323">vergi kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2324">αριθμός φορολογικού μητρώου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2324">αριθμός φορολογικού μητρώου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2325">κωδικός φορολογικού μητρώου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2325">κωδικός φορολογικού μητρώου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2326">φορολογική ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2326">φορολογική ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2327">φορολογικού κωδικού</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2327">φορολογικού κωδικού</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2328">課税番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2328">tax number</span></span>

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2329">チェコドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2329">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2330">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2330">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2331">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2332">2つの文字の後に6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2332">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2333">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2333">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2334">8つの文字と数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2334">Eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2335">2桁の文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2335">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2336">スペース 1 つ (省略可能) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2336">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2337">6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2337">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2338">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2338">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2339">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2339">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2340">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2340">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2341">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2341">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2342">正規表現は、 `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2342">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2343">From キーワード `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2343">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2344">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2344">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2345">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2345">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2346">dl#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2346">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2347">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2347">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2348">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2348">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2349">ドライバーのライセンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2349">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2350">ドライバー lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2350">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2351">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2351">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2352">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2352">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2353">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2353">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2354">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2354">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2355">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2355">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2356">ドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2356">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2357">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2357">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2358">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2358">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2359">řidičský prúkaz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2359">řidičský prúkaz</span></span>

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2360">チェコのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2360">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2361">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2361">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2362">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2362">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2363">スペースまたは区切り文字を含まない8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2363">Eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2364">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2364">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2365">スペースまたは区切り文字を含まない8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2365">Eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2366">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2366">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2367">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2367">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2368">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2368">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2369">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2369">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2370">正規表現は、 `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2370">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2371">From キーワード `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2371">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2372">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2372">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2373">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2373">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2374">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2374">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2375">チェコのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2375">czech passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2376">passport いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2376">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2377">cestovní pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2377">cestovní pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2378">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2378">pas</span></span>

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2379">チェコの個人 id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2379">Czech personal identity number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2380">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 id 番号バンドルに含まれており、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2380">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National identification number bundle and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2381">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2381">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2382">省略可能なスラッシュ (旧形式) を含む 9 桁の数字 省略可能なスラッシュ (新形式) を含む 10 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2382">Nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2383">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2383">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2384">9桁の数字 (古い形式):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2384">Nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2385">9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2385">Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2386">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2386">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2387">生年月日を表す6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2387">Six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2388">スラッシュ 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2388">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2389">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2389">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2390">10桁の数字 (新しい形式):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2390">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2391">10 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2391">10 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2392">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2392">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2393">生年月日を表す6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2393">Six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2394">スラッシュ 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2394">A forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2395">4桁の数字 (最後の桁はチェックディジット)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2395">Four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2396">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2397">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2397">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2398">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2399">DLP ポリシーは85% です。この種類の機密情報は、近接する300文字の中で検出されます。関数 Func_czech_id_card は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2399">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2400">Keyword_czech_id_card からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2400">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2401">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2401">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
<Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497"      patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
      <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2402">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2402">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2403">チェコの個人 id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2403">czech personal identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2404">Rodnéčíslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2404">Rodné číslo</span></span>



## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2405">チェコ語のソーシャルセキュリティ番号または同等の識別情報</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2405">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2406">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 社会保障番号または同等の ID の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2406">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2407">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2407">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2408">指定したパターンの10桁の数字と円記号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2408">Ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2409">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2409">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2410">10桁の数字と円記号:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2410">Ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2411">誕生日に対応する6桁の数字 (YYMMDD という):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2411">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2412">円記号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2412">A backslash</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2413">同じ日付で個人の出生を区切るシリアル番号に対応する3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2413">Three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2414">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2414">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2415">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2416">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2416">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2417">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2418">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2418">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2419">関数は、 `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2419">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2420">From キーワード `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2420">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2421">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2421">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2422">関数は、 `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2422">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2425">出生地番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2425">birth number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2427">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2427">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2428">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2428">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2429">nationalnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2429">nationalnumber#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2431">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2431">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2432">国番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2432">national number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2436">rodnéčíslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2436">rodné číslo</span></span>

## <a name="czech-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2438">チェコの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2438">Czech tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2439">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務識別番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2439">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2440">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2440">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2441">9桁または10桁の数字 (省略可能な円記号付き)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2441">Nine or ten digits with an optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2442">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2442">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2443">9桁または10桁の数字で、省略可能な backslashl を指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2443">Nine or ten digits with an optional backslashl:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2444">6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2444">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2445">円記号 (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2445">A backslash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2446">3桁または4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2446">Three or four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2447">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2447">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2448">該当しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2448">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2449">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2449">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2450">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2450">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2451">正規表現は、 `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2451">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2452">From キーワード `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2452">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2491">デンマークの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2491">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2492">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2492">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2493">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2493">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2494">スペースと区切り文字を含まない8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2494">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2495">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2495">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2496">8 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2496">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2497">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2497">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2498">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2498">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2499">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2499">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2500">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2500">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2501">正規表現は、 `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2501">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2502">From キーワード `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2502">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2503">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2503">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2504">**Keywords_denmark_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2504">**Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2505">| dl#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2505">|dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2508">ドライバーのライセンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2508">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2509">ドライバー lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2509">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2510">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2510">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2511">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2511">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2512">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2512">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2513">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2513">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2514">ドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2514">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2515">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2515">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2519">デンマークのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2519">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2520">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2520">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2521">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2521">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2522">スペースと区切り文字を含まない9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2522">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2523">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2523">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2524">9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2524">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2525">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2525">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2526">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2526">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2527">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2527">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2528">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2528">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2529">正規表現は、 `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2529">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2530">From キーワード `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2530">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2531">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2531">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2532">**Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2532">**Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2533">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2533">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2534">デンマークのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2534">danish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2535">passport いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2535">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2536">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2536">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2537">pasnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2537">pasnummer</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2538">デンマークの個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2538">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2539">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類に含まれており、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2539">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2540">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2540">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2541">ハイフンを 1 つ含む 10 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2541">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2542">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2542">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2543">10 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2543">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2544">DDMMYY の形式の生年月日を表す 6 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2544">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2545">ハイフン 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2545">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2546">4 桁の数字 (最後の桁はチェック ディジット)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2546">Four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2547">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2547">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2548">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2548">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2549">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2549">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2550">DLP ポリシーは75% です。この種類の機密情報は、近接する300文字の中で検出されます。正規表現 Regex_denmark_id は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2550">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The regular expression Regex_denmark_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2551">Keyword_denmark_id からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2551">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2552">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2552">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
<Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2604">デンマークの社会保障番号または同等の id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2604">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2605">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 社会保障番号または同等の ID の機密情報の種類のみを使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2605">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2606">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2606">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2607">指定したパターンの10桁の数字とハイフン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2607">Ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2608">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2608">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2609">10桁の数字とハイフン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2609">Ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2610">誕生日に対応する6桁の数字 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2610">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2611">ハイフン 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2611">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2612">シーケンス番号に対応する4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2612">Four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2613">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2613">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2614">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2614">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2615">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2615">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2616">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2616">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2617">関数は、 `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2617">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2618">From キーワード `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2618">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2619">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2619">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2620">関数は、 `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2620">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2621">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2621">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2622">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2622">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2623">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2623">personal identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2625">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2625">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2626">nationalnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2626">nationalnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2627">ssn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2627">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2628">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2628">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2629">国番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2629">national number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2630">個人 id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2630">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2631">personalidnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2631">personalidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2632">cpr-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2632">cpr-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2633">personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2633">personnummer</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2634">デンマークの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2634">Denmark tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2635">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務識別番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2635">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2636">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2636">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2637">10桁の数字 (ハイフンを含む)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2637">Ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2638">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2638">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2639">Hyphenl を含む10桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2639">Ten digits containing a hyphenl:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2640">誕生日に対応する6桁の数字 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2640">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2641">ハイフン 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2641">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2642">1桁目が誕生日の世紀に対応し、最後の桁は個人の性別に対応する4桁の数字 (男性の場合は奇数、女性の場合もあります)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2642">Four digits that correspond to a sequence number where the first digit corresponds to the century of birth and the last digit corresponds to the individual's gender (odd for male and even for female)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2643">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2643">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2644">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2644">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2645">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2645">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2646">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2646">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2647">関数は、 `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2647">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2648">From キーワード `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2648">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2649">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2649">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2650">関数は、 `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2650">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2702">医薬品執行機関 (DEA) 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2702">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2703">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2703">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2704">2 桁の文字の後に 7 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2704">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2705">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2705">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2706">パターンには、以下のすべてが含まれる必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2706">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2707">次の文字セットのいずれか 1 つの文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない):abcdefghjklmnprstux。これは登録者コードです</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2707">One letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2708">1 文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)。登録者の姓の最初の文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2708">One letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2709">7 桁の数字。最後の桁はチェック ディジット用です</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2709">Seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2710">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2710">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2711">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2711">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2712">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2712">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2713">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2713">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2714">関数 Func_dea_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2714">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2715">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2715">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2716">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2716">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2717">なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2717">None</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2718">エストニアの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2718">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2719">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2719">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2720">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2720">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2721">2つの文字の後に6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2721">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2722">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2722">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2723">2つの文字と6桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2723">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2724">文字 "ET" (大文字と小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2724">The letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2725">6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2725">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2726">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2726">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2727">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2727">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2728">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2728">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2729">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2729">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2730">正規表現は、 `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2730">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2731">From キーワード `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2731">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2732">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2732">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2733">**Keywords_estonia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2733">**Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2734">dl#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2734">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2735">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2735">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2736">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2736">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2737">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2737">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2738">ドライバーのライセンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2738">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2739">ドライバー lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2739">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2740">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2740">drivers license</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2747">エストニア国立識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2747">Estonia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2748">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2748">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2749">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2749">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2750">スペースと区切り文字を含まない11桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2750">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2751">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2751">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2752">11 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2752">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2753">性別と世紀に対応する1桁の数字 (奇数個の男性、偶数の女性、1-2:19 世紀、3-4:20 世紀、5-6:21 世紀)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2753">One digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2754">誕生日に対応する6桁の数字 (YYMMDD という)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2754">Six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2755">同じ日付に出生地を分けるシリアル番号に対応する3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2755">Three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2756">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2756">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2757">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2757">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2758">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2758">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2759">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2759">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2760">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2760">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2761">関数は、 `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2761">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2762">From キーワード `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2762">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2763">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2763">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2764">関数は、 `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2764">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
</Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2797">エストニアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2797">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2798">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2798">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2799">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2799">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2800">1文字の後に7桁の数字 (スペースまたは区切り記号なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2800">One letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2801">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2801">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2802">1文字の後に7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2802">One letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2803">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2804">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2804">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2805">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2806">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2806">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2807">正規表現は、 `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2807">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2808">From キーワード `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2808">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2809">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2809">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2810">**Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2810">**Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2811">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2811">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2812">エストニア語のパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2812">estonian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2813">passport いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2813">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2814">eesti kodaniku pass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2814">eesti kodaniku pass</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2815">エストニア税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2815">Estonia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2816">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務識別番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2816">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2817">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2817">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2818">スペースまたは区切り文字を含まない11桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2818">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2819">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2819">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2820">11 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2820">11 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2821">性別と世紀に対応する1桁の数字。奇数は男性を表し、偶数の場合は1、2は19世紀に対しては女性を示します。20世紀に3、4世紀。21世紀の場合は5、6。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2821">One digit that corresponds to gender and century of birth where an odd number indicates male and the even number indicates female as follows: 1, 2 for the 19th century; 3, 4 for the 20th century; and 5, 6 for the 21st century</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2822">誕生日に対応する6桁の数字 (YYMMDD という)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2822">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2823">同じ日付に出生地を分けるシリアル番号に対応する3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2823">Three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2824">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2824">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2825">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2825">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2826">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2826">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2827">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2827">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2828">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2828">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2829">関数は、 `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2829">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2830">From キーワード `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2830">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2831">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2831">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2832">関数は、 `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2832">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2833">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2833">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2834">Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2834">Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2835">id-kaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2835">id-kaart</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2836">ik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2836">ik</span></span>

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2865">EU のデビット カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2865">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2866">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2866">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2867">16 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2867">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2868">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2868">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2869">非常に複雑で信頼性の高いパターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2869">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2870">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2870">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2871">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2871">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2872">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2872">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2873">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2873">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2874">関数 Func_eu_debit_card がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2874">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2875">次の条件のうち 1 つ以上に該当する:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2875">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2876">Keyword_eu_debit_card のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2876">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2877">Keyword_card_terms_dict のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2877">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2878">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2878">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2879">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2879">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2880">関数 Func_expiration_date が適切な日付形式の日付を検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2880">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-2881">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-2881">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3327">フィンランドの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3327">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3328">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3328">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3329">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3330">ハイフンを 1 つ含む 10 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3330">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3331">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3332">ハイフンを含む10桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3332">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3333">6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3333">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3334">ハイフン 1 つ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3334">A hyphen</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3335">4 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3335">Four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3336">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3336">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3337">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3337">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3338">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3338">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3339">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3339">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3340">正規表現は、 `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3340">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3341">From キーワード `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3341">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3342">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3342">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3343">**Keywords_finland_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3343">**Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3344">dl#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3344">dl#</span></span>

## <a name="finland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3357">フィンランドの米国の識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3357">Finland national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3358">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類に含まれており、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3358">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3359">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3359">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3360">6 桁の数字、世紀を表す 1 桁の文字、3 桁の数字、1 桁のチェック ディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3360">Six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3361">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3361">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3362">パターンには、以下のすべてが含まれる必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3362">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3363">DDMMYY という形式の誕生日を示す 6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3363">Six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3364">世紀マーカー (「-」、「+」、または「a」)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3364">Century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3365">3 桁の個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3365">Three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3366">チェック ディジットとして機能する 1 桁の数字または文字 (大文字小文字の区別あり)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3366">A digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3367">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3367">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3368">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3368">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3369">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3369">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3370">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3370">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3371">関数 Func_finnish_national_id がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3371">The function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3372">Keyword_finnish_national_id のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3372">A keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3373">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3373">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finnish National ID-->
<Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
