## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3422">フィンランドのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3422">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3423">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類で利用でき、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3423">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3424">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3424">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3425">9 桁の文字と数字の組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3425">Combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3426">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3426">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3427">9桁の文字と数字の組み合わせ: 2 文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない) 7 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3427">Combination of nine letters and digits: Two letters (not case sensitive) Seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3428">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3428">Checksum</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3429">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3429">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3430">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3430">Definition</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3431">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3431">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3432">正規表現 Regex_finland_passport_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3432">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3433">Keyword_finland_passport_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3433">A keyword from Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3434">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3434">Keywords</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3435">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3435">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3436">サインアウト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3436">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3437">Passi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3437">Passi</span></span>

## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3438">フィンランドの社会保障番号または同等の id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3438">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3439">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 社会保障番号または同等の ID の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3439">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3440">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3440">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3441">指定した書式の11文字の組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3441">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3442">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3442">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3443">指定した形式の11文字の組み合わせ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3443">An 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3444">6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3444">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3445">次のいずれかのインスタンス。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3445">One instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3446">プラス記号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3446">Plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3447">マイナス記号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3447">Minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3448">文字 "A" (大文字と小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3448">The letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3449">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3449">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3450">1文字または1桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3450">One letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3451">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3451">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3452">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3452">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3453">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3453">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3454">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3454">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3455">関数は、 `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3455">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3456">From キーワード `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3456">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3457">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3457">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3458">関数は、 `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3458">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3482">フィンランドの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3482">Finland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3483">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務識別番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3483">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3484">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3484">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3485">数字、文字、プラス記号とマイナス記号の11文字の組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3485">An 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3486">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3486">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3487">数字、文字、プラス記号とマイナス記号の11文字の組み合わせ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3487">An 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3488">6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3488">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3489">プラス記号、マイナス記号、または文字 "A" (大文字小文字を区別しない) の1つ。プラス記号を1800-1899 の間に置きます。マイナス記号は、1900-1999 の間に出生することを意味2000します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3489">One of the following: a plus sign, a minus sign, or the letter "A" (not case sensitive) where the plus sign means born between 1800-1899, the minus sign means born between 1900-1999, and "A" means born 2000 and after</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3490">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3490">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3491">1つの文字または1つの番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3491">One letter or one number</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3492">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3492">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3493">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3493">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3494">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3494">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3495">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3495">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3496">関数は、 `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3496">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3497">From キーワード `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3497">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3498">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3498">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3499">関数は、 `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3499">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3550">フランスの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3550">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3551">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類で利用でき、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3551">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3552">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3552">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3553">12 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3553">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3554">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3554">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3555">フランスの電話番号などの同様のパターンと区別するための検証付きの 12 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3555">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3556">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3556">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3557">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3557">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3558">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3558">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3559">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3559">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3560">関数 Func_french_drivers_license がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3560">The function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3561">次の条件のうち 1 つ以上に該当する:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3561">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3562">Keyword_french_drivers_license のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3562">A keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3563">関数 Func_eu_date が適切な日付形式の日付を検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3563">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3566">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3566">drivers licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3568">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3568">driving licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3569">driving license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3569">driving license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3572">license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3572">license number</span></span>

## <a name="france-national-identification-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3575">フランスの国民識別カード (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3575">France national identification card (CNI)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3576">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類に含まれており、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3576">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3577">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3577">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3578">12 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3578">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3579">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3579">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3580">12 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3580">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3581">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3581">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3582">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3582">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3583">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3583">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3584">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3584">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3585">正規表現 Regex_france_cni がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3585">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France CNI -->
<Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3586">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3586">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3587">card number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3587">card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3588">個別の nationale d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3588">carte nationale d’identité</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3589">個別 nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3589">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3590">cni#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3590">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3591">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3591">cni</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3592">compte bancaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3592">compte bancaire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3593">国別の識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3593">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3594">国民 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3594">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3595">nationalidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3595">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3596">numéro d'assurance/男性 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3596">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3597">numéro de 個別 vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3597">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3598">フランスのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3598">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3599">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類で利用でき、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3599">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3600">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3600">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3601">9 桁の数字と文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3601">Nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3602">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3602">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3603">9 つの数字と文字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3603">Nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3604">2 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3604">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3605">2 つの文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3605">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3606">5 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3606">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3607">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3607">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3608">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3608">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3609">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3609">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3610">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3610">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3611">関数 Func_fr_passport がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3611">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3612">Keyword_passport のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3612">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3613">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3613">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3614">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3614">Keyword_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3615">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3615">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3616">Passport No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3616">Passport No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3617">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3617">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3618">サインアウト#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3618">Passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3619">PassportID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3619">PassportID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3620">Passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3620">Passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3621">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3621">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3622">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3622">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3623">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3623">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3624">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3624">パスポートのNum</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3625">パスポート ＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3625">パスポート ＃</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3626">Numéro de passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3626">Numéro de passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3627">Passeport n °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3627">Passeport n °</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3629">Passeport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3629">Passeport #</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3631">PasseportNon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3631">PasseportNon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3632">Passeportn °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3632">Passeportn °</span></span>

      
## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3633">フランスの社会保障番号 (INSEE) または同等の id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3633">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3634">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 社会保障番号および同等の ID 機密情報の種類に含まれており、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3634">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3635">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3635">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3636">15 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3636">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3637">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3637">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3638">次のいずれかのパターンに一致する:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3638">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3639">13桁の数字の後にスペースを続け、2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3639">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3640">または</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3640">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3641">15 桁の連続する数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3641">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3642">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3642">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3643">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3643">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3644">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3644">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3645">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、95% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3645">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3646">関数 Func_french_insee または Func_fr_insee は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3646">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3647">Keyword_fr_insee のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3647">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3648">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3648">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3649">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3649">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3650">関数 Func_french_insee または Func_fr_insee は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3650">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3651">Keyword_fr_insee のキーワードを検出しなかった。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3651">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3652">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3652">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3653">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3653">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_fr_insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3654">Keyword_fr_insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3654">Keyword_fr_insee</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3655">insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3655">insee</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3656">securité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3656">securité sociale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3657">securite sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3657">securite sociale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3658">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3658">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3659">national identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3659">national identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3660">numéro d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3660">numéro d'identité</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3661">no d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3661">no d'identité</span></span>

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3678">フランスの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3678">France tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3679">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務識別番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3679">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3680">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3680">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3681">各ユーザーの13桁の数字、およびエンティティの9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3681">13 digits for individuals and nine digits for entities</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3682">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3682">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3683">個人の場合は13桁。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3683">13 digits for individuals:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3684">0、1、2、または3である1桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3684">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3685">12 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3685">12 digits</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3686">エンティティの9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3686">Nine digits for entities</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3687">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3687">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3688">該当しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3688">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3689">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3689">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3690">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3690">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3691">関数は、 `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3691">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3692">From キーワード `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3692">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3693">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3693">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3694">関数は、 `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3694">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3714">ドイツの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3714">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3715">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類に含まれており、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3715">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3716">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3716">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3717">11 桁の数字と文字の組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3717">Combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3718">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3718">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3719">11 個の数字と文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3719">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3720">1 つの数字または文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3720">A digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3721">2 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3721">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3722">6 つの数字または文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3722">Six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3723">1 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3723">A digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3724">1 つの数字または文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3724">A digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3725">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3726">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3726">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3727">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3728">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3728">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3729">関数 Func_german_drivers_license がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3729">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3730">次の条件のうち 1 つ以上に該当する:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3730">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3731">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3731">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3732">Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3732">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3733">Keyword_german_drivers_license のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3733">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3734">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3734">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3827">ドイツの id カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3827">Germany identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3828">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類に含まれており、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3828">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3829">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 社会保障番号または同等の ID の機密情報の種類に含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3829">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3830">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3830">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3831">2010年11月1日以降: 9 桁の文字と数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3831">Since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3832">1987年4月1日から2010年10月31日まで:10 桁</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3832">From 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3833">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3833">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3834">2010 年 11 月 1 日以降:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3834">Since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3835">1 桁の文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3835">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3836">8 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3836">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3837">1987年4月1日から2010年10月31日まで。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3837">From 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3838">10 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3838">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3839">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3840">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3840">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3841">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3842">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3842">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3843">正規表現 Regex_germany_id_card は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3843">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3844">Keyword_germany_id_card からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3844">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3845">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3845">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3846">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3846">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3848">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3848">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3849">fim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3849">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3850">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3850">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3851">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3851">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3852">id カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3852">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3853">id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3853">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3854">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3854">id-nummer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3856">personalausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3856">personalausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3857">persönliche id nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3857">persönliche id nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3858">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3858">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3859">persönliche-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3859">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3860">ドイツのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3860">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3861">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類に含まれており、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3861">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3862">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3862">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3863">10 桁の数字または文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3863">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3864">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3864">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3865">パターンには、以下のすべてが含まれる必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3865">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3866">最初の文字は 1 桁の数字、またはこのセット (C、F、G、H、J、K) からの 1 文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3866">First character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3867">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3867">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3868">数字またはこの文字セット (C、H、J から N、P、R、T、V から Z) から 5 個</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3868">Five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3869">1 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3869">A digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3870">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3870">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3871">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3871">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3872">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3872">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3873">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3873">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3874">関数 Func_german_passport がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3874">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3875">5 つのキーワード リストのうちいずれかのキーワードを検索した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3875">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3876">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3876">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3877">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3877">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3878">関数 Func_german_passport_data がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3878">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3879">5 つのキーワード リストのうちいずれかのキーワードを検索した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3879">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3880">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3880">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Passport Number -->
<Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3898">ドイツの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3898">Germany tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3899">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務識別番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3899">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3900">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3900">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3901">スペースと区切り文字を含まない11桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3901">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3902">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3902">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3903">11桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3903">11 digits :</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3904">10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3904">Ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3905">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3905">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3906">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3907">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3907">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3908">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3909">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3909">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3910">関数は、 `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3910">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3911">From キーワード `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3911">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3912">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3912">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3913">関数は、 `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3913">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3939">ギリシャの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3939">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3940">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類に含まれており、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3940">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3941">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3941">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3942">スペースと区切り文字を含まない9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3942">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3943">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3943">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3944">9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3944">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3945">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3945">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3946">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3946">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3947">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3947">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3948">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3948">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3949">正規表現は、 `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3949">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3950">From キーワード `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3950">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3951">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3951">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3952">**Keywords_greece_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3952">**Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3955">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3955">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3956">ドライバーのライセンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3956">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3957">ドライバー lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3957">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3958">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3958">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3959">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3959">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3960">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3960">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3961">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3961">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3962">ドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3962">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3963">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3963">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3964">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3964">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3965">δεια οδήγησης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3965">δεια οδήγησης</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3966">Adeia odigisis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3966">Adeia odigisis</span></span>


## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3967">ギリシャの国民識別カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3967">Greece National ID Card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3968">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類に含まれており、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3968">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3969">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3969">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3970">7 ～ 8 桁の文字と数字の組み合わせとハイフン 1 つ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3970">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3971">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3971">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3972">7 桁の文字と数字 (従来の形式):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3972">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3973">1 桁の文字 (ギリシャ語のアルファベット文字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3973">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3974">ハイフン 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3974">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3975">6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3975">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3976">8 桁の文字と数字 (現在の形式):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3976">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3977">ギリシャ語にもラテン語にも大文字がある文字 (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) を使用した 2 桁の文字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3977">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3978">ハイフン 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3978">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3979">6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3979">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3980">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3980">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3981">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3981">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3982">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3982">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3983">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3983">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3984">正規表現 Regex_greece_id_card は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3984">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3985">Keyword_greece_id_card からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3985">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Greece National ID Card -->
<Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3987">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3987">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3989">ギリシャの国民 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3989">greek national id</span></span>

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3996">ギリシャのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3996">Greece passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3997">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3997">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3998">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3998">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-3999">2つの文字の後に、スペースや区切り文字を含まない7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-3999">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4000">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4000">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4001">2 桁の文字の後に 7 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4001">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4002">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4002">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4003">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4003">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4004">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4004">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4005">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4005">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4006">正規表現は、 `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4006">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4007">From キーワード `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4007">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4008">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4008">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4009">**Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4009">**Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4010">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4010">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4011">ギリシャのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4011">greek passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4012">passport いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4012">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4013">διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4013">διαβατηριο</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4014">ギリシャの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4014">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4015">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務識別番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4015">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4016">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4016">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4017">スペースと区切り文字を含まない9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4017">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4018">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4018">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4019">9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4019">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4020">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4020">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4021">該当しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4021">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4022">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4022">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4023">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4023">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4024">正規表現は、 `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4024">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4025">From キーワード `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4025">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4054">香港の id カード (HKID) 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4054">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4055">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4055">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4056">8 ～ 9 桁の文字と数字の組み合わせ、最後の文字はかっこで囲むことも可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4056">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4057">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4057">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4058">8 ～ 9 桁の文字の組み合わせ:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4058">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4059">1 ～ 2 桁の文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4059">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4060">6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4060">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4061">チェック ディジットとして機能する最後の文字 (任意の数字か文字 A) はかっこで囲むことも可能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4061">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4062">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4062">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4063">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4063">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4064">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4064">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4065">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4065">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4066">関数 Func_hong_kong_id_card は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4066">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4067">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4067">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4068">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4068">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4069">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4069">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4070">関数 Func_hong_kong_id_card は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4070">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4071">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4071">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4078">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4078">identity card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4081">香港身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4081">香港身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4082">香港永久性居民身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4082">香港永久性居民身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4083">身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4083">身份證</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4085">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4085">身分證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4086">身分証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4086">身分証</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4087">香港身份証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4087">香港身份証</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4088">香港身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4088">香港身分證</span></span>
