## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4111">ハンガリードライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4111">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4112">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4112">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4113">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4114">2つの文字の後に6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4114">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4115">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4115">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4116">2つの文字と6桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4116">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4117">2桁の文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4117">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4118">6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4118">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4119">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4119">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4120">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4120">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4121">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4121">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4122">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4122">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4123">正規表現は、 `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4123">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4124">From キーワード `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4124">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4125">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4125">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4126">**Keywords_hungary_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4126">**Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4127">dl#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4127">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4128">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4128">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4129">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4129">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4130">ドライバーのライセンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4130">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4131">ドライバー lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4131">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4132">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4132">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4133">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4133">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4134">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4134">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4135">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4135">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4136">ドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4136">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4137">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4137">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4138">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4138">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4139">vezetoi engedely</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4139">vezetoi engedely</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4140">ハンガリーの国の識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4140">Hungary national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4141">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4141">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4142">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4142">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4143">11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4143">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4144">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4144">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4145">11 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4145">11 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4146">性別に対応する1桁の数字 (1-オス、2-女性、その他の数字は1900または市民が二重市民権を持つ市民の場合もあります)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4146">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4147">誕生日に対応する6桁の数字 (YYMMDD という)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4147">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4148">シリアル番号に対応する3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4148">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4149">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4149">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4150">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4150">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4151">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4151">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4152">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4152">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4153">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4153">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4154">関数は、 `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4154">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4155">From キーワード `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4155">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4156">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4156">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4157">関数は、 `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4157">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
</Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4158">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4158">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4159">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4159">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4160">id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4160">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4161">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4161">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4162">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4162">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4163">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4163">sz.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4164">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4164"> ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4165">。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4165">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4166">személyazonosító igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4166">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4167">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4167">személyi igazolvány</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4168">ハンガリーのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4168">Hungary passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4169">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4169">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4170">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4170">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4171">2つの文字の後に、スペースや区切り文字を含まない6桁または7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4171">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4172">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4172">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4173">2つの文字の後に6桁または7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4173">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4174">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4174">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4175">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4175">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4176">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4176">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4177">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4177">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4178">正規表現は、 `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4178">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4179">From キーワード `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4179">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4180">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4180">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4181">**Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4181">**Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4182">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4182">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4183">ハンガリーのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4183">hungarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4184">passport いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4184">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4185">útlevél száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4185">útlevél száma</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4186">ハンガリーの社会保障番号または同等の id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4186">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4187">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 社会保障番号または同等の ID の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4187">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4188">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4188">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4189">スペースと区切り文字を含まない9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4189">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4190">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4190">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4191">9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4191">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4192">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4192">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4193">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4193">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4194">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4194">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4195">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4195">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4196">関数は、 `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4196">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4197">From キーワード `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4197">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4198">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4198">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4199">関数は、 `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4199">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4203">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4203">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4204">指定した仮のセキュリティ番号#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4204">socialsecuritynumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4205">hssn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4205">hssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4206">"対話型"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4206">socialsecuritynno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4207">hssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4207">hssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4208">taj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4208">taj</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4209">taj#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4209">taj#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4210">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4210">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4211">ssn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4211">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4212">ソーシャルセキュリティなし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4212">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4213">áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4213">áfa</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4215">általános forgalmi adó szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4215">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4216">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4216">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4217">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4217">áfa szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4218">magyar áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4218">magyar áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4219">ハンガリーの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4219">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4220">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務識別番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4220">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4221">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4221">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4222">スペースまたは区切り文字を含まない10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4222">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4223">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4223">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4224">10桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4224">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4225">"8" である1桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4225">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4226">日付01/01/1867 と個人の誕生日との間の日数に対応する5桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4226">Five digits that correspond to the number of days between the date 01/01/1867 and the date of the birth of the individual</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4227">同じ日に生まれた個人を区別する機会によって生成された番号に対応する3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4227">Three digits that correspond to the number generated by chance to differentiate individuals born on the same day</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4228">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4228">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4229">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4229">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4230">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4230">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4231">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4231">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4232">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4232">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4233">関数は、 `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4233">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4234">From キーワード `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4234">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4235">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4235">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4236">関数は、 `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4236">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4241">adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4241">adószám</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4245">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4246">税 id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4246">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4247">税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4247">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4248">課税番号#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4248">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4249">課税番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4249">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4250">課税番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4250">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4251">税務登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4251">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4252">taxid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4252">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4253">taxidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4253">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4254">taxidnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4254">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4255">taxno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4255">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4256">taxnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4256">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4257">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4257">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4258">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4258">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4259">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4259">tin no</span></span>

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4262">インドの恒久口座番号 (PAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4262">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4263">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4263">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4264">10 桁の文字または数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4264">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4265">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4265">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4266">10 桁の文字または数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4266">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4267">5 桁の文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4267">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4268">4 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4268">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4269">チェック ディジットとして機能する 1 桁のアルファベット文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4269">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4270">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4270">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4271">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4271">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4272">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4272">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4273">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4273">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4274">正規表現 Regex_india_permanent_account_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4274">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4275">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4275">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4276">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4276">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4277">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4277">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4278">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4278">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4279">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4279">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4280">ペン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4280">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4281">インドの一意識別子 (Aadhaar) 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4281">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4282">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4282">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4283">省略可能なスペースまたはハイフンを含む 12 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4283">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4284">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4284">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4285">12 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4285">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4286">4 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4286">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4287">スペースまたはハイフン 1 つ (省略可能) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4287">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4288">4 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4288">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4289">スペースまたはハイフン 1 つ (省略可能) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4289">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4290">最後の数字はチェック ディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4290">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4291">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4292">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4292">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4293">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4294">DLP ポリシーは85% です。この種類の機密情報は、近接する300文字の中で検出されます。関数 Func_india_aadhaar は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4294">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4295">Keyword_india_aadhar からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4295">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4296">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4296">The checksum passes.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4297">DLP ポリシーは75% です。この種類の機密情報は、近接する300文字の中で検出されます。関数 Func_india_aadhaar は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4297">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4298">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4298">The checksum passes.</span></span>
```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4299">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4299">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4300">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4300">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4301">Aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4301">Aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4302">Aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4302">Aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4303">UID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4303">UID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4304">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4304">आधार</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4305">インドネシアの id カード (KTP) 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4305">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4306">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4306">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4307">省略可能なピリオドを含む 16 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4307">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4308">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4308">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4309">16 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4309">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4310">2 桁の行政区コード </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4310">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4311">ピリオド 1 つ (省略可能) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4311">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4312">2 桁の行政区または市コード </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4312">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4313">2 桁の分区コード </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4313">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4314">ピリオド 1 つ (省略可能) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4314">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4315">DDMMYY の形式の生年月日を表す 6 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4315">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4316">ピリオド 1 つ (省略可能) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4316">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4317">4 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4317">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4318">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4318">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4319">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4319">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4320">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4320">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4321">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4321">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4322">正規表現 Regex_indonesia_id_card は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4322">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4323">Keyword_indonesia_id_card からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4323">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4324">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4324">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4325">正規表現 Regex_indonesia_id_card は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4325">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4326">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4326">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4327">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4327">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4328">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4328">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4329">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4329">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4330">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4330">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4331">国際銀行口座番号 (IBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4331">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4332">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4332">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4333">国コード (2 文字)、チェックディジット (2 桁)、および番号を bban 最大30文字)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4333">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4334">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4334">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4335">パターンには、以下のすべてが含まれる必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4335">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4336">2文字の国コード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4336">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4337">2つのチェックディジット (オプションのスペースが続く)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4337">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4338">1-7 4 つの文字または数字のグループ (スペースで区切ることができます)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4338">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4339">1 ～ 3 個の文字または数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4339">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4340">各国の形式は少し異なります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4340">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4341">IBAN 機密情報の種類には、次の60国が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4341">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4342">ad、ae、al、at、az、ba、be、bg、bh、ch、cr、cy、cz、de、dk、do、ee、es、fi、fo、fr、gb、ge、gi、gl、gr、hr、hu、ie、[il]、[it]、[]、[(it)]、[(kz)]、[、li、lt、lu、lv、mc]、[]、[いいえ]、[mr]、[]、[]、[、]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4342">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4343">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4343">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4344">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4344">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4345">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4345">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4346">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4346">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4347">関数 Func_iban がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4347">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4348">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4348">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4349">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4349">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4350">なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4350">None</span></span>

   

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4351">Diseases の国際分類 (ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4351">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4352">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4352">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4353">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4353">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4354">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4354">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4355">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4355">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4356">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4356">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4357">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4357">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4358">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4358">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4359">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4359">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4360">Dictionary_icd_10_updated からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4360">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4361">Dictionary_icd_10_codes からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4361">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4362">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4362">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4363">Dictionary_icd_10_ 更新されたキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4363">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4364">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4364">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4365">Dictionary_icd_10_updated キーワードディクショナリからの任意の用語。 [Diseases、10リビジョン、臨床修正 (icd-10-CM) の国際分類](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)に基づいています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4365">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4366">この型は、保険コードではなく、用語に対してのみ表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4366">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4367">Dictionary_icd_10_codes キーワードディクショナリからの任意の用語。 [Diseases、10リビジョン、臨床修正 (icd-10-CM) の国際分類](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)に基づいています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4367">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4368">この型は、説明ではなく、保険コードに対してのみ表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4368">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4369">Diseases の国際分類 (ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4369">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4370">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4370">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4371">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4371">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4372">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4372">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4373">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4373">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4374">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4374">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4375">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4375">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4376">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4376">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4377">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4377">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4378">Dictionary_icd_9_updated からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4378">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4379">Dictionary_icd_9_codes からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4379">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4380">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4380">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4381">Dictionary_icd_9_updated からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4381">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4382">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4382">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4383">Dictionary_icd_9_updated キーワードディクショナリの任意の用語。 [Diseases、9リビジョン、臨床修正 (icd-9-CM) の国際分類](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)に基づいています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4383">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4384">この型は、保険コードではなく、用語に対してのみ表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4384">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4385">Dictionary_icd_9_codes キーワードディクショナリの任意の用語。 [Diseases、9リビジョン、臨床修正 (icd-9-CM) の国際分類](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)に基づいています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4385">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4386">この型は、説明ではなく、保険コードに対してのみ表示されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4386">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4387">IP アドレス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4387">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4388">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4388">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4389">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4389">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4390">書式設定あり (ピリオド付き) または書式設定なし (ピリオドなし) のIPv4 アドレスを表す複雑なパターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4390">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4391">IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4391">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4392"> 書式設定あり (コロン付き) の IPv6 番号を表す複雑なパターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4392">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4393">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4393">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4394">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4394">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4395">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4395">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4396">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4396">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4397">IPv6 の場合、DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4397">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4398">正規表現 Regex_ipv6_address がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4398">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4399">Keyword_ipaddress のキーワードを検出しなかった。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4399">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4400">IPv4 の場合、DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、95% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4400">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4401">正規表現 Regex_ipv4_address がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4401">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4402">Keyword_ipaddress のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4402">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4403">IPv6 の場合、DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、95% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4403">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4404">正規表現 Regex_ipv6_address がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4404">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4405">Keyword_ipaddress のキーワードを検出しなかった。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4405">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4406">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4406">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4407">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4407">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4408">IP (このキーワードでは大文字と小文字が区別されます)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4408">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4409">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4409">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4410">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4410">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4411">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4411">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4412">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4412">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4413">アイルランドの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4413">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4414">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4414">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4415">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4415">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4416">6桁の数字の後に4文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4416">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4417">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4417">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4418">6桁の数字と4文字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4418">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4419">6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4419">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4420">4桁の文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4420">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4421">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4421">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4422">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4422">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4423">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4423">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4424">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4424">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4425">正規表現は、 `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4425">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4426">From キーワード `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4426">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4427">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4427">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4428">**Keywords_ireland_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4428">**Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4429">dl#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4429">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4430">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4430">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4431">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4431">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4432">ドライバーのライセンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4432">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4433">ドライバー lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4433">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4434">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4434">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4435">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4435">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4436">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4436">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4437">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4437">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4438">ドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4438">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4439">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4439">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4440">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4440">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4441">ceadúnas tiomána</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4441">ceadúnas tiomána</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4442">アイルランドの国の識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4442">Ireland national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4443">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類にのみ含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4443">This sensitive information type entity is only included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4444">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4444">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4445">指定したパターンの文字、数字、スペースの9文字の組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4445">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4446">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4446">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4447">指定したパターンの文字、数字、スペースの9文字の組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4447">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4448">01年 1 2013 月から今すぐに。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4448">From 01 January 2013 to now:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4449">7 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4449">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4450">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4450">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4451">1つのスペースまたは大文字の "W" (大文字小文字を区別)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4451">One space or the uppercase letter "W" (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4452">01年1月2013前:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4452">Prior to 01 January 2013:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4453">7 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4453">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4454">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4454">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4455">1つのスペースまたは大文字 (大文字と小文字を区別)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4455">One space or an uppercase letter (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4456">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4457">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4457">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4458">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4459">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4459">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4460">関数は、パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4460">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4461">From キーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4461">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4462">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4462">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4463">関数は、パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4463">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!--Ireland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4464">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4464">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4465">Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4465">Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card</span></span>
