## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4492">アイルランドのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4492">Ireland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4493">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4493">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4494">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4494">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4495">2つの文字または数字の後に、スペースや区切り文字を含まない7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4495">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4496">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4496">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4497">2つの文字または数字の後に7桁の数字が続きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4497">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4498">2 つの数字または文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4498">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4499">7 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4499">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4500">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4500">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4501">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4501">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4502">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4502">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4503">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4503">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4504">正規表現は、 `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4504">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4505">From キーワード `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4505">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4506">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4506">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4507">**Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4507">**Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4508">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4508">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4509">アイルランドのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4509">irish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4510">passport いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4510">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4511">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4511">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4512">サインアウト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4512">passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4513">passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4513">passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4514">passeport numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4514">passeport numero</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4515">アイルランドの個人用パブリックサービス (PPS) 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4515">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4516">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4516">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4517">古い形式 (2012 年12月31日まで):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4517">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4518">7 桁の数字の後に 1 ～ 2 桁の文字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4518">Seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4519">新しい形式 (1 Jan 2013 以降):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4519">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4520">7 桁の数字の後に 2 桁の文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4520">Seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4521">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4521">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4522">古い形式 (2012 年12月31日まで):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4522">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4523">7 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4523">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4524">1 ～ 2 桁の文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4524">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4525">新しい形式 (1 Jan 2013 以降):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4525">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4526">7 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4526">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4527">チェック ディジットとして機能する 1 桁のアルファベット文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4527">A letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4528">文字「A」または「H」 (大文字小文字の区別なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4528">The letter "A" or "H" (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4529">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4530">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4530">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4531">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4532">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4532">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4533">関数 Func_ireland_pps は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4533">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4534">次のいずれかの条件に該当する:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4534">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4535">Keyword_ireland_pps からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4535">A keyword from Keyword_ireland_pps is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4536">関数 Func_eu_date が適切な日付形式の日付を検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4536">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4537">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4537">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4538">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4538">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4539">関数 Func_ireland_pps は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4539">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4540">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4540">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
<Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
     <Any minMatches="1">
  <Match idRef="Keyword_ireland_pps"/>
  <Match idRef="Func_eu_date"/>
     </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4541">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4541">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ireland_pps"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4542">Keyword_ireland_pps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4542">Keyword_ireland_pps</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4543">Personal Public Service Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4543">Personal Public Service Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4544">PPS Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4544">PPS Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4545">PPS Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4545">PPS Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4546">PPS No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4546">PPS No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4547">PPS #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4547">PPS #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4548">PPS#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4548">PPS#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4549">PPSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4549">PPSN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4550">Public Services Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4550">Public Services Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4551">Uimhir Phearsanta Seirbhíse Poiblí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4551">Uimhir Phearsanta Seirbhíse Poiblí</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4552">Uimh.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4552">Uimh.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4553">PSP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4553">PSP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4554">PSP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4554">PSP</span></span> 


## <a name="ireland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4555">アイルランドの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4555">Ireland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4556">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務識別番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4556">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4557">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4557">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4558">7桁の数字の後にスペースまたは区切り文字を含まない文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4558">Seven digits followed by a letter with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4559">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4559">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4560">7桁の数字の後に、文字を続けます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4560">Seven digits followed by a letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4561">7 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4561">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4562">1文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4562">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4563">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4563">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4564">該当しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4564">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4565">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4565">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4566">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4566">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4567">関数は、 `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4567">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4568">From キーワード `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4568">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4569">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4569">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4570">関数は、 `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4570">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4599">イスラエルの銀行口座番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4599">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4600">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4600">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4601">13 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4601">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4602">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4602">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4603">さ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4603">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4604">2 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4604">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4605">ダッシュ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4605">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4606">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4606">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4607">ダッシュ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4607">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4608">8 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4608">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4609">なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4609">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4610">	13 桁の連続する数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4610">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4611">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4611">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4612">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4612">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4613">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4613">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4614">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4614">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4615">正規表現 Regex_israel_bank_account_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4615">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4616">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4616">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4617">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4617">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4618">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4618">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4619">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4619">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4620">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4620">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4621">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4621">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4622">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4622">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4623">イスラエルの国民識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4623">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4624">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4624">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4625">9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4625">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4626">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4626">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4627">9 桁の連続する数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4627">Nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4628">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4628">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4629">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4629">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4630">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4630">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4631">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4631">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4632">関数 Func_israeli_national_id_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4632">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4633">Keyword_Israel_National_ID のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4633">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4634">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4634">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4635">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4635">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4636">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4636">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4637">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4637">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4638">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4638">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4639">イタリアの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4639">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4640">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類に含まれており、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4640">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4641">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4641">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4642">10 桁の文字と数字の組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4642">A combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4643">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4643">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4644">10 個の文字と数字の組み合わせ:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4644">A combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4645">1 文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4645">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4646">文字 "A" または "V" (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4646">The letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4647">7 つの文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)、数字、またはアンダースコア文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4647">Seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4648">1 文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4648">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4649">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4649">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4650">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4650">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4651">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4651">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4652">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4652">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4653">正規表現 Regex_italy_drivers_license_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4653">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4654">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4654">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4655">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4655">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4656">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4656">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4657">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4657">numero di patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4658">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4658">patente di guida</span></span> 

## <a name="italy-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4659">イタリアの米国の識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4659">Italy national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4660">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4660">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4661">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4662">指定したパターンの文字と数字の16文字の組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4662">A 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4663">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4664">文字と数字の16文字の組み合わせ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4664">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4665">ファミリ名の最初の3つの子音に対応する3つの文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4665">Three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4666">最初の名前の最初、3番目、および4番目の子音に対応する3つの文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4666">Three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4667">誕生年の最後の桁に対応する2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4667">Two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4668">誕生日の文字に対応する1つの文字-文字はアルファベット順に使用されますが、A から E、H、L、M、P、R から T までの文字が使用されます (つまり、1月は A と10月は R)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4668">One letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4669">Genders を区別するために、誕生日に対応する2桁の数字は、女性の誕生日に40が追加されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4669">Two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4670">個人が生まれた municipality に固有のエリアコードに対応する4桁の数字 (国全体のコードは外国で使用されます)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4670">Four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4671">1つのパリティ付き数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4671">One parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4672">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4672">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4673">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4673">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4674">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4674">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4675">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4675">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4676">関数は、 `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4676">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4677">From キーワード `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4677">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4678">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4678">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4679">関数は、 `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4679">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Italy national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4714">イタリアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4714">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4715">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4715">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4716">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4716">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4717">2つの文字または数字の後に、スペースや区切り文字を含まない7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4717">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4718">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4718">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4719">2つの文字または数字の後に7桁の数字が続きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4719">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4720">2 つの数字または文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4720">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4721">7 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4721">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4722">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4722">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4723">該当しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4723">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4724">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4724">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4725">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4725">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4726">正規表現は、 `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4726">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4727">From キーワード `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4727">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4728">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4728">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4729">**Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4729">**Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4730">イタリアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4730">italian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4731">repubblica italiana passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4731">repubblica italiana passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4732">passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4732">passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4733">passaporto italiana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4733">passaporto italiana</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4734">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4734">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4735">italiana passaporto numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4735">italiana passaporto numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4736">passaporto numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4736">passaporto numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4737">numéro passeport italien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4737">numéro passeport italien</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4738">numéro passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4738">numéro passeport</span></span>

## <a name="italy-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4739">イタリアの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4739">Italy tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4740">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務識別番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4740">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4741">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4741">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4742">指定したパターンの16桁の文字と数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4742">16 letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4743">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4743">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4744">16桁の文字と数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4744">16 letters and digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4745">ファミリ名の最初の3つの子音に対応する3つの文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4745">Three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4746">最初の名前の最初、3番目、および4番目の子音に対応する3つの文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4746">Three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4747">誕生年の最後の桁に対応する2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4747">Two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4748">誕生日に対応する1桁の数字。文字はアルファベット順に使用されますが、A から E、H、L、M、P、R から T までの文字が使用されます (つまり、1月は A と10月は R)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4748">One digit that corresponds to the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4749">誕生日に対応する2桁の数字。40が男性と区別するために女性の誕生日に追加されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4749">Two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth where 40 is added to the day of birth for females to differentiate from males</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4750">個人が生まれた municipality に固有のエリアコードに対応する4桁の数字。国全体のコードが外国の国に使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4750">Four digits that correspond to an area code specific to the municipality where the person was born—country-wide codes are used for foreign countries</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4751">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4751">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4752">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4752">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4753">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4753">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4754">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4754">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4755">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4755">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4756">関数は、 `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4756">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4757">From キーワード `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4757">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4758">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4758">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4759">関数は、 `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4759">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4794">日本の銀行口座番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4794">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4795">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4795">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4796">7 桁または 8 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4796">Seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4797">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4797">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4798">銀行口座番号:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4798">Bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4799">7 桁または 8 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4799">Seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4800">銀行口座支店コード:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4800">Bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4801">4 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4801">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4802">スペースまたはダッシュ (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4802">A space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4803">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4803">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4804">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4805">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4805">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4806">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4807">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4807">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4808">関数 Func_jp_bank_account がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4808">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4809">Keyword_jp_bank_account のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4809">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4810">次のいずれかの条件に該当する:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4810">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4811">関数 Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4811">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4812">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4812">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4813">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4813">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4814">関数 Func_jp_bank_account がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4814">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4815">Keyword_jp_bank_account のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4815">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4874">日本の運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4874">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4875">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4875">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4876">12 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4876">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4877">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4877">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4878">12 桁の連続する数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4878">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4879">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4879">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4880">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4880">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4881">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4881">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4882">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4882">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4883">関数 Func_jp_drivers_license_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4883">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4884">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4884">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4912">日本のパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4912">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4913">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4913">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4914">2 桁の文字の後に 7 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4914">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4915">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4915">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4916">2 桁の文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし) の後に 7 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4916">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4917">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4918">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4918">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4919">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4920">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4920">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4921">関数 Func_jp_passport がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4921">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4922">Keyword_jp_passport のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4922">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4923">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4923">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4926">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4926">パスポート番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4929">居住地のカード番号 (日本)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4929">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4930">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4930">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4931">12桁の文字と数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4931">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4932">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4932">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4933">12桁の文字と数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4933">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4934">2 桁の文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4934">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4935">8 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4935">Eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4936">2 桁の文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4936">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4937">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4937">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4938">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4938">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4939">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4939">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4940">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4940">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4941">正規表現 Regex_jp_residence_card_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4941">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4942">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4942">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4943">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4943">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4944">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4944">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4945">居住カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4945">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4946">住居カードなし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4946">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4947">住居カード#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4947">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4948">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4948">在留カード番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4949">日本の居住登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4949">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4950">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4950">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4951">11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4951">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4952">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4952">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4953">11 桁の連続する数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4953">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4954">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4954">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4955">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4955">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4956">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4956">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4957">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4957">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4958">関数 Func_jp_resident_registration_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4958">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4959">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4959">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4963">Resident Register Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4963">Resident Register Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4964">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4964">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4965">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4965">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4966">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4966">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4967">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4967">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4968">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4968">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4969">住民登録番号、登録番号をレジデント</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4969">住民登録番号、登録番号をレジデント</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4971">住民基本レジストリ番号を常駐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4971">住民基本レジストリ番号を常駐</span></span>

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4973">日本の社会保険番号 (SIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4973">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4974">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4974">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4975">7～ 12 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4975">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4976">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4976">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4977">7 ～ 12 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4977">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4978">4 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4978">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4979">ハイフン (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4979">A hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4980">6桁の数字または</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4980">Six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4981">7 ～ 12 桁の連続する数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4981">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4982">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4982">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4983">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4983">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4984">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4984">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4985">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4985">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4986">関数 Func_jp_sin がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4986">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4987">Keyword_jp_sin のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4987">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4988">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4988">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4989">関数 Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4989">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4990">Keyword_jp_sin のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4990">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4991">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4991">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4992">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4992">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4993">Social Insurance No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4993">Social Insurance No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4994">Social Insurance Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4994">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4995">Social Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4995">Social Insurance Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4996">社会保険のテンキー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4996">社会保険のテンキー</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4997">社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4997">社会保険番号</span></span> 

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4998">ラトビアドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4998">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-4999">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-4999">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5000">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5000">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5001">3つの文字の後に6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5001">Three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5002">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5002">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5003">3つの文字と6桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5003">Three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5004">3桁の文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5004">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5005">6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5005">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5006">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5006">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5007">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5007">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5008">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5008">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5009">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5009">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5010">正規表現は、 `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5010">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5011">From キーワード `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5011">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5012">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5012">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5013">**Keywords_latvia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5013">**Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5014">dl#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5014">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5015">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5015">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5016">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5016">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5017">ドライバーのライセンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5017">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5018">ドライバー lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5018">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5019">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5019">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5020">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5020">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5021">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5021">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5022">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5022">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5023">ドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5023">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5024">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5024">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5025">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5025">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5026">autovadītāja apliecība</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5026">autovadītāja apliecība</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5027">ラトビア国立識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5027">Latvia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5028">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5028">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5029">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5029">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5030">11桁の数字と、指定された形式のハイフン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5030">11 digits and a hyphen in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5031">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5031">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5032">11桁の数字とハイフン:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5032">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5033">誕生日に対応する6桁の数字 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5033">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5034">ハイフン 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5034">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5035">誕生日の世紀に対応する1桁の数字 (「0」、20世紀の場合は「1」、21世紀の場合は「2」)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5035">One digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5036">ランダムに生成される4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5036">Four digits, randomly generated</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5037">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5037">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5038">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5038">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5039">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5039">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5040">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5040">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5041">関数は、 `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5041">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5042">From キーワード `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5042">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5043">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5043">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5044">関数は、 `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5044">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Latvia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5064">national id</span></span>
