## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5107">ラトビアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5107">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5108">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5108">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5109">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5110">2つの文字または数字の後に、スペースや区切り文字を含まない7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5110">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5111">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5111">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5112">2つの文字または数字の後に7桁の数字が続きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5112">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5113">2 つの数字または文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5113">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5114">7 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5114">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5115">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5115">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5116">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5116">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5117">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5117">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5118">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5118">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5119">正規表現は、 `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5119">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5120">From キーワード `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5120">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5121">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5121">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5122">**Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5122">**Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5123">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5123">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5124">ラトビアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5124">latvian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5125">passport いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5125">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5126">pase numurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5126">pase numurs</span></span>    

## <a name="latvia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5127">ラトビアの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5127">Latvia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5128">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務識別番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5128">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5129">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5129">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5130">スペースまたは区切り文字を含まない11桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5130">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5131">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5131">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5132">指定したパターンの11桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5132">11 digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5133">誕生日に対応する6桁の数字 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5133">Six digits that correspond to the date of birth (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5134">"0" が19世紀に対応する1桁の数字、"1" は20世紀に、"2" は21世紀に対応します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5134">One digit that corresponds to the century of birth where "0" corresponds to 19th century, "1" corresponds to 20th century, and "2"corresponds to 21st century</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5135">4 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5135">Four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5136">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5136">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5137">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5137">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5138">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5138">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5139">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5139">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5140">関数は、 `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5140">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5141">From キーワード `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5141">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5142">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5142">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5143">関数は、 `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5143">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5206">リトアニア運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5206">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5207">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5207">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5208">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5208">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5209">スペースと区切り文字を含まない8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5209">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5210">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5210">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5211">8 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5211">Eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5212">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5212">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5213">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5213">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5214">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5214">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5215">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5215">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5216">正規表現は、 `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5216">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5217">From キーワード `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5217">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5219">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5219">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5222">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5222">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5223">ドライバーのライセンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5223">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5225">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5225">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5226">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5226">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5227">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5227">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5228">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5228">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5229">ドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5229">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5230">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5230">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5233">リトアニア国立識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5233">Lithuania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5234">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5234">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5235">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5235">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5236">スペースと区切り文字を含まない11桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5236">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5237">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5237">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5238">スペースと区切り文字を含まない11桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5238">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5239">ユーザーの性別および誕生世紀に対応する1桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5239">One digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5240">誕生日に対応する6桁の数字 (YYMMDD という)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5240">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5241">誕生日のシリアル番号に対応する3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5241">Three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5242">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5242">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5243">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5244">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5244">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5245">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5246">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5246">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5247">関数は、 `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5247">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5248">From キーワード `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5248">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5249">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5249">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5250">関数は、 `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5250">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Lithuania national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5285">リトアニアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5285">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5286">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5286">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5287">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5287">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5288">8桁の数字または文字、スペースまたは区切り記号なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5288">Eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5289">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5289">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5290">8桁の数字または文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5290">Eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5291">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5292">該当しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5292">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5293">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5294">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5294">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5295">正規表現は、 `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5295">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5296">From キーワード `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5296">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5297">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5297">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5298">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5298">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5299">パスポート番号パスポートのパスポート番号パスポート numeris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5299">passport number lithunian passport number passport no paso numeris</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5300">リトアニア税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5300">Lithuania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5301">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務識別番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5301">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5302">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5302">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5303">11桁の数字 (スペースまたは区切り文字なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5303">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5304">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5304">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5305">11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5305">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5306">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5306">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5307">該当しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5307">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5308">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5308">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5309">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5309">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5310">関数は、 `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5310">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5311">From キーワード `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5311">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5312">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5312">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5313">関数は、 `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5313">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5347">ルクセンブルグドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5347">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5348">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 運転者のライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5348">his sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5349">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5349">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5350">スペースと区切り文字を含まない6桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5350">Six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5351">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5351">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5352">6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5352">Six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5353">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5353">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5354">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5354">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5355">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5355">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5356">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5356">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5357">正規表現は、 `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5357">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5358">From キーワード `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5358">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5360">**Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5360">**Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5363">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5363">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5364">ドライバーのライセンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5364">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5370">ドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5370">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5371">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5371">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5374">ルクセンブルク国立識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5374">Luxemburg national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5375">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5375">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5376">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5376">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5377">スペースと区切り文字を含まない11桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5377">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5378">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5378">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5379">11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5379">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5380">ユーザーの性別および誕生世紀に対応する1桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5380">One digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5381">誕生日に対応する6桁の数字 (YYMMDD という)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5381">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5382">誕生日のシリアル番号に対応する3桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5382">Three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5383">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5383">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5384">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5384">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5385">該当しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5385">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5386">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5386">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5387">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5387">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5388">正規表現は、 `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5388">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5389">From キーワード `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5389">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5412">ルクセンブルグパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5412">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5413">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5413">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5414">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5414">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5415">8桁の数字または文字、スペースまたは区切り記号なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5415">Eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5416">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5416">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5417">8桁の数字または文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5417">Eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5418">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5418">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5419">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5419">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5420">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5420">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5421">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5421">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5422">正規表現は、 `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5422">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5423">From キーワード `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5423">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5424">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5424">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5425">**Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5425">**Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5426">パスポート番号ラトビア語パスポート番号パスポート no passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5426">passport number latvian passport number passport no passnummer</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5427">ルクセンブルク税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5427">Luxemburg tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5428">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務識別番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5428">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5429">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5429">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5430">13桁の数字、スペースまたは区切り記号なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5430">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5431">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5431">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5432">13 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5432">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5433">11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5433">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5434">2 桁のチェック ディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5434">Two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5435">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5435">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5436">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5436">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5437">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5437">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5438">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5438">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5439">関数は、 `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5439">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5440">From キーワード `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5440">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5441">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5441">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5442">関数は、 `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5442">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5482">マレーシアの識別カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5482">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5483">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5483">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5484">省略可能なハイフンを含む 12 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5484">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5485">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5485">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5486">12 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5486">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5487">YYMMDD の形式の生年月日を表す 6 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5487">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5488">ハイフン 1 つ (省略可能) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5488">A dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5489">出生地コードを表す 2 桁の文字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5489">Two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5490">ハイフン 1 つ (省略可能) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5490">A dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5491">3 桁のランダムな数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5491">Three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5492">1 桁の性別コード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5492">One-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5493">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5493">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5494">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5494">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5495">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5495">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5496">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5496">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5497">正規表現 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5497">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5498">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5498">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5499">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5499">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_malaysia_id_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5500">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5500">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5501">デジタルアプリケーションカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5501">digital application card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5502">i/c</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5502">i/c</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5503">i/c いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5503">i/c no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5504">ic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5504">ic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5505">ic no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5505">ic no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5506">id card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5506">id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5507">識別カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5507">identification Card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5508">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5508">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5509">k/p</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5509">k/p</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5510">k/p no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5510">k/p no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5511">kad akuan diri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5511">kad akuan diri</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5512">kad aplikasi digital</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5512">kad aplikasi digital</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5514">kp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5514">kp</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5515">kp no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5515">kp no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5518">mykid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5518">mykid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5519">mypr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5519">mypr</span></span>

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5525">マルタ運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5525">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5526">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5526">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5527">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5527">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5528">指定したパターンの2つの文字と6桁の数字の組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5528">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5529">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5529">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5530">2つの文字と6桁の数字の組み合わせ:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5530">Combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5531">2つの文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない数字または文字)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5531">Two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5532">スペース 1 つ (省略可能) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5532">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5533">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5533">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5534">スペース 1 つ (省略可能) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5534">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5535">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5535">Three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5536">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5536">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5537">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5537">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5538">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5538">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5539">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5539">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5540">正規表現は、 `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5540">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5541">From キーワード `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5541">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5542">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5542">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5543">**Keywords_malta_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5543">**Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5544">dl#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5544">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5545">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5545">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5546">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5546">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5547">ドライバーのライセンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5547">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5548">ドライバー lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5548">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5549">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5549">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5550">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5550">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5551">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5551">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5552">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5552">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5553">ドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5553">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5554">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5554">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5555">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5555">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5556">liċenzja tas-sewqan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5556">liċenzja tas-sewqan</span></span>

## <a name="malta-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5557">マルタ国立識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5557">Malta national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5558">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5558">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5559">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5559">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5560">7桁の数字の後に1文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5560">Seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5561">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5561">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5562">7桁の数字の後に1文字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5562">Seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5563">7 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5563">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5564">1つの大文字 (大文字と小文字を区別)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5564">One uppercase letter (case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5565">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5565">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5566">該当しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5566">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5567">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5567">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5568">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5568">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5569">正規表現は、 `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5569">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5570">From キーワード `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5570">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5571">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5571">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5572">正規表現は、 `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5572">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Malta national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5573">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5573">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5574">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5574">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5575">市民サービス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5575">citizen service number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5576">id tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5576">id tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5577">identifika numru tal-biljett</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5577">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5578">kodiċi numerali パーソナル i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5578">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5579">numru ta ' identifikazzjoni パーソナル i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5579">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5580">numru ta ' identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5580">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5581">numru ta ' identifikazzjoni uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5581">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5582">numru ta ' 識別子 tuniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5582">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5583">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5583">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5584">numru tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5584">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5585">個人の数値コード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5585">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5586">一意の識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5586">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5587">一意の id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5587">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5588">uniqueidentityno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5588">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>


## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5589">マルタのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5589">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5590">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5590">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5591">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5591">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5592">スペースまたは区切り文字を含まない7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5592">Seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5593">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5593">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5594">7 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5594">Seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5595">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5595">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5596">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5596">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5597">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5597">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5598">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5598">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5599">正規表現は、 `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5599">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5600">From キーワード `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5600">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5601">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5601">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5602">**Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5602">**Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5603">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5603">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5604">マルタのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5604">maltese passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5605">passport いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5605">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5606">numru tal-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5606">numru tal-passaport</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5607">マルタ税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5607">Malta tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5608">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務識別番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5608">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5609">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5609">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5610">マルタ nationals の場合: 7 桁の数字と、指定したパターンの1文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5610">For Maltese nationals: 7 digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5611">非マルタ nationals およびマルタエンティティ: 9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5611">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: 9 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5612">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5612">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5613">マルタ nationals: 7 桁と1文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5613">Maltese nationals: 7 digits and one letter</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5614">7 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5614">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5615">1文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5615">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5616">非マルタ nationals およびマルタエンティティ: 9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5616">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: 9 digits</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5617">9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5617">Nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5618">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5618">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5619">該当しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5619">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5620">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5620">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5621">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5621">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5622">関数は、 `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5622">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5623">From キーワード `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5623">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5624">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、65% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5624">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5625">関数は、 `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5625">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5658">オランダの市民サービス (BSN) 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5658">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5659">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5659">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5660">省略可能なハイフンを含む 8 ～ 9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5660">8-9 digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5661">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5661">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5662">8 ～ 9 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5662">8-9 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5663">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5663">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5664">スペース 1 つ (省略可能) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5664">A space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5665">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5665">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5666">スペース 1 つ (省略可能) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5666">A space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5667">2 ～ 3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5667">2-3 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5668">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5669">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5669">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5670">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5671">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5671">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5672">関数 Func_netherlands_bsn は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5672">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5673">Keyword_netherlands_bsn からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5673">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5674">関数 Func_eu_date2 は、日付を正しい日付形式で検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5674">The function Func_eu_date2 finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5675">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5675">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
<Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Keyword_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Func_eu_date2" /> 
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5678">bsn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5678">bsn#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5682">個人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5682">person number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5684">個人の数値コード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5684">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5685">個人関連の番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5685">person-related number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5686">persoonlijk nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5686">persoonlijk nummer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5688">persoonsgebonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5688">persoonsgebonden</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5689">persoonsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5689">persoonsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5690">sociaal-fiscaal nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5690">sociaal-fiscaal nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5691">社会会計番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5691">social-fiscal number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5692">sofi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5692">sofi</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5693">sofinummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5693">sofinummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5694">uniek identificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5694">uniek identificatienummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5695">uniek identiteitsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5695">uniek identiteitsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5696">一意の識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5696">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5697">一意の id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5697">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5698">uniqueidentityno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5698">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5699">オランダドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5699">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5700">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5700">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5701">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5701">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5702">スペースと区切り文字を含まない10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5702">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5703">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5703">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5704">10 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5704">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5705">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5705">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5706">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5706">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5707">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5707">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5708">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5708">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5709">正規表現は、 `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5709">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5710">From キーワード `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5710">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5711">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5711">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5712">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5712">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5713">dl#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5713">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5714">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5714">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5715">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5715">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5716">ドライバーのライセンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5716">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5717">ドライバー lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5717">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5718">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5718">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5719">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5719">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5720">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5720">driver's license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5722">ドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5722">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5723">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5723">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5728">オランダの国の識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5728">Netherlands national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5729">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5729">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5730">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5730">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5731">スペースまたは区切り文字を含まない9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5731">Nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5732">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5732">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5733">9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5733">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5734">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5734">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5735">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5735">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5736">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5736">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5737">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5737">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5738">関数は、 `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5738">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5739">From キーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5739">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5740">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5740">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5741">関数は、 `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5741">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Netherland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5761">uniek identiteitsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5761">uniek identiteitsnummer</span></span>
