## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5765">オランダのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5765">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5766">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5766">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5767">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5767">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5768">9文字または数字 (スペースまたは区切り記号なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5768">Nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5769">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5769">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5770">9桁の文字または数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5770">Nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5771">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5771">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5772">該当しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5772">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5773">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5773">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5774">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5774">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5775">正規表現は、 `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5775">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5776">From キーワード `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5776">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5777">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5777">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5778">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5778">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5779">オランダのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5779">dutch passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5780">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5780">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5781">オランダのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5781">netherlands passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5782">nederlanden の nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5782">nederlanden paspoort nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5783">大き poort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5783">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5784">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5784">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5785">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5785">paspoortnummer</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5786">オランダの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5786">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5787">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務識別番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5787">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5788">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5788">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5789">スペースまたは区切り文字を含まない9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5789">Nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5790">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5790">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5791">9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5791">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5792">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5792">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5793">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5793">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5794">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5794">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5795">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5795">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5796">関数は、 `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5796">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5797">From キーワード `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5797">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5798">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5798">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5799">関数は、 `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5799">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5817">オランダ tin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5817">netherlands tin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5818">netherland の tin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5818">netherland's tin</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5819">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5820">税 id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5820">tax identification no</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5837">ニュージーランドの衛生官庁番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5837">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5838">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5838">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5839">3 桁の文字、スペース 1 つ (省略可能)、4 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5839">Three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5840">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5840">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5841">3文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない) スペース (省略可能)、4桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5841">Three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5842">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5842">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5843">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5843">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5844">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5844">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5845">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5845">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5846">関数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5846">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5847">Keyword_nz_terms のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5847">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5848">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5848">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5849">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5849">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5850">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5850">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5851">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5851">NHI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5852">New Zealand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5852">New Zealand</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5853">正常性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5853">Health</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5854">処理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5854">treatment</span></span> 
   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5855">ノルウェーの識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5855">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5856">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5856">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5857">11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5857">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5858">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5858">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5859">11 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5859">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5860">DDMMYY の形式の生年月日を表す 6 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5860">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5861">3 桁の個人番号 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5861">Three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5862">2 桁のチェック ディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5862">Two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5863">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5863">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5864">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5864">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5865">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5865">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5866">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5866">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5867">関数 Func_norway_id_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5867">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5868">Keyword_norway_id_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5868">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5869">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5869">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5870">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5870">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5871">関数 Func_norway_id_numbe は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5871">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5872">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5872">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5873">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5873">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5874">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5874">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5875">Personal identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5875">Personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5876">Norwegian ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5876">Norwegian ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5877">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5877">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5878">Fim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5878">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5879">Personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5879">Personnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5880">Fødselsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5880">Fødselsnummer</span></span>

   
## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5881">フィリピン統合多重目的識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5881">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5882">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5882">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5883">ハイフンで区切られた 12 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5883">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5884">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5884">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5885">12 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5885">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5886">4 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5886">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5887">ハイフン 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5887">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5888">7 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5888">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5889">ハイフン 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5889">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5890">1 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5890">One digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5891">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5891">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5892">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5892">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5893">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5893">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5894">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5894">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5895">正規表現 Regex_philippines_unified_id は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5895">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5896">Keyword_philippines_id からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5896">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5897">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5897">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5898">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5898">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5899">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5899">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5900">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5900">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5901">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5901">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5902">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5902">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5903">ポーランドの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5903">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5904">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5904">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5905">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5905">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5906">2つのスラッシュを含む14桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5906">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5907">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5907">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5908">14桁の数字と2つのスラッシュ:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5908">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5909">5 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5909">Five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5910">スラッシュ 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5910">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5911">2 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5911">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5912">スラッシュ 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5912">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5913">7 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5913">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5914">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5914">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5915">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5915">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5916">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5916">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5917">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5917">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5918">正規表現は、 `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5918">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5919">From キーワード `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5919">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5920">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5920">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5921">**Keywords_poland_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5921">**Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5922">dl#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5922">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5923">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5923">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5924">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5924">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5925">ドライバーのライセンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5925">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5926">ドライバー lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5926">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5927">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5927">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5928">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5928">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5929">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5929">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5930">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5930">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5931">ドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5931">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5932">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5932">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5933">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5933">dlno#</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5935">ポーランドの id カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5935">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5936">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5936">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5937">3 桁の文字と 6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5937">Three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5938">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5938">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5939">3 桁の文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし) の後に 6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5939">Three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5940">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5941">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5941">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5942">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5943">DLP ポリシーは75% です。この種類の機密情報は、近接する300文字の中で検出されます。関数 Func_polish_national_id は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5943">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5944">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5944">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5945">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5945">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5946">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5946">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5947">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5947">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5948">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5948">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5949">特定 dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5949">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5950">Nazwa i 特定 dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5950">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5951">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5951">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5952">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5952">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5953">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5953">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5954">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5954">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5955">hp-ux.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5955">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5956">ポーランドの国民 ID (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5956">Poland National ID (PESEL)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5957">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類に含まれており、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5957">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5958">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5958">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5959">11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5959">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5960">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5960">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5961">11 桁の連続する数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5961">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5962">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5962">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5963">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5963">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5964">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5964">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5965">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5965">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5966">関数 Func_pesel_identification_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5966">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5967">Keyword_pesel_identification_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5967">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5968">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5968">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->      
<Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5969">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5969">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5970">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5970">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5971">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5971">dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5972">dowódosobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5972">dowódosobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5973">niepowtarzalny 特定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5973">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5974">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5974">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5975">nr-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5975">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5976">nr-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5976">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5977">特定 identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5977">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5978">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5978">pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5979">tożsamości narodowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5979">tożsamości narodowej</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5980">ポーランドのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5980">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5981">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類に含まれており、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5981">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5982">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5982">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5983">2 桁の文字と 7 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5983">Two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5984">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5984">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5985">2 桁の文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし) の後に 7 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5985">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5986">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5986">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5987">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5987">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5988">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5988">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5989">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5989">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5990">関数 Func_polish_passport_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5990">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5991">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5991">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5992">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5992">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5993">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5993">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5994">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5994">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5995">特定の引数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5995">Numer paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5996">Nr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5996">Nr.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5997">大き zportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5997">Paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5998">があります</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5998">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-5999">ポーランドの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-5999">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6000">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務識別番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6000">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6001">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6001">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6002">スペースまたは区切り文字を含まない11桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6002">Eleven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6003">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6003">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6004">11桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6004">Eleven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6005">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6005">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6006">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6006">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6007">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6007">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6008">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6008">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6009">関数は、 `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6009">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6010">From キーワード `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6010">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6011">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6011">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6012">関数は、 `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6012">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6013">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6013">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6014">Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6014">Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6015">nip#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6015">nip#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6016">nip</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6016">nip</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6017">特定 identyfikacji podat・ wewej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6017">numer identyfikacji podatkowej</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6018">numeridentyfikacjipodatkowej#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6018">numeridentyfikacjipodatkowej#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6019">tax id
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6019">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6020">税 id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6020">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6021">税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6021">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6022">課税番号#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6022">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6023">課税番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6023">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6024">課税番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6024">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6025">税務登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6025">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6026">taxid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6026">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6027">taxidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6027">taxidno#</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6042">ポルトガルの市民カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6042">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6043">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類に含まれており、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6043">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6044">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 社会保障番号または同等の ID の機密情報の種類に含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6044">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6045">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6045">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6046">8 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6046">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6047">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6047">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6048">8 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6048">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6049">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6049">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6050">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6050">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6051">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6051">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6052">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6052">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6053">正規表現 Regex_portugal_citizen_card は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6053">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6054">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6054">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6055">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6055">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_portugal_citizen_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6056">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6056">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6057">同一/中における重複識別子 dade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6057">bilhete de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6058">cartão de cidadão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6058">cartão de cidadão</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6059">市民カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6059">citizen card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6060">ドキュメント番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6060">document number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6061">documento de identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6061">documento de identificação</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6062">id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6062">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6063">識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6063">identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6064">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6064">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6065">id カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6065">identity card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6066">id カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6066">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6067">国番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6067">national id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6068">nic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6068">nic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6069">número bi de ポルトガル</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6069">número bi de portugal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6070">número de identificação 民事</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6070">número de identificação civil</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6071">número de identificação 会計</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6071">número de identificação fiscal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6072">número do documento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6072">número do documento</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6073">ポルトガルの bi 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6073">portugal bi number</span></span>


## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6074">ポルトガルドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6074">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6075">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6075">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6076">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6076">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6077">指定したパターンの2文字の後に7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6077">Two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6078">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6078">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6079">2つの文字の後に特殊文字を含む7個の数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6079">Two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6080">2桁の文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6080">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6081">ハイフン 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6081">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6082">6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6082">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6083">スペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6083">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6084">1 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6084">One digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6085">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6085">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6086">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6086">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6087">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6087">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6088">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6088">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6089">正規表現は、 `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6089">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6090">From キーワード `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6090">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6091">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6091">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6092">**Keywords_portugal_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6092">**Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6093">dl#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6093">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6094">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6094">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6095">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6095">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6096">ドライバーのライセンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6096">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6097">ドライバー lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6097">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6098">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6098">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6099">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6099">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6100">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6100">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6101">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6101">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6102">ドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6102">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6103">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6103">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6104">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6104">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6105">carteira de motorista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6105">carteira de motorista</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6106">ポルトガルのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6106">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6107">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6107">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6108">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6108">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6109">1文字の後に6桁の数字 (スペースまたは区切り記号を付けない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6109">One letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6110">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6110">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6111">1文字の後に6桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6111">One letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6112">1 文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6112">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6113">6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6113">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6114">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6114">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6115">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6115">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6116">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6116">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6117">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6117">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6118">正規表現は、 `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6118">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6119">From キーワード `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6119">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6120">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6120">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6121">**Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6121">**Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6122">パスポート番号ポルトガル語 (ポルトガル) のパスポート番号パスポート no número do passaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6122">passport number portuguese passport number passport no número do passaporte</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6123">ポルトガルの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6123">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6124">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務識別番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6124">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6125">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6125">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6126">スペースまたは区切り文字を含まない9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6126">Nine digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6127">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6127">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6128">9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6128">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6129">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6129">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6130">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6130">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6131">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6131">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6132">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6132">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6133">関数は、 `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6133">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6134">From キーワード `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6134">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6135">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6135">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6136">関数は、 `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6136">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6161">ルーマニアドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6161">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6162">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6162">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6163">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6164">1文字の後に8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6164">One character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6165">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6166">1文字の後に8桁の数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6166">One character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6167">1文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない) または数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6167">One letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6168">8 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6168">Eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6169">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6169">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6170">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6170">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6171">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6171">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6172">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6172">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6173">正規表現は、 `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6173">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6174">From キーワード `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6174">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6176">**Keywords_romania_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6176">**Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6178">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6178">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6179">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6179">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6180">ドライバーのライセンス</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6180">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6181">ドライバー lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6181">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6182">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6182">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6183">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6183">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6184">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6184">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6185">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6185">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6186">ドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6186">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6187">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6187">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="romania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6190">ルーマニア国立識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6190">Romania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6191">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6191">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6192">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6192">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6193">13桁の数字 (スペースと区切り文字なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6193">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6194">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6194">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6195">13 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6195">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6196">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6196">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6197">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6197">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6198">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6198">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6199">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6199">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6200">関数は、 `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6200">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6201">From キーワード `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6201">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6202">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6202">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6203">関数は、 `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6203">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Romania national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6254">ルーマニアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6254">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6255">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6255">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6256">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6256">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6257">スペースと区切り文字を除いた8桁または9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6257">Eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6258">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6258">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6259">8桁または9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6259">Eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6260">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6260">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6261">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6261">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6262">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6262">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6263">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6263">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6264">正規表現は、 `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6264">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6265">From キーワード `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6265">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6266">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6266">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6267">**Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6267">**Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6268">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6268">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6269">ルーマニアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6269">romanian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6270">passport いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6270">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6271">numărul pașaportului</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6271">numărul pașaportului</span></span>

## <a name="romania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6272">ルーマニアの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6272">Romania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6273">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務識別番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6273">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6274">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6274">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6275">13桁の数字、スペースまたは区切り記号なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6275">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6276">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6276">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6277">13 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6277">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6278">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6278">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6279">該当しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6279">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6280">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6280">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6281">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6281">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6282">正規表現は、 `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6282">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6283">From キーワード `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6283">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
