## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6334">サウジアラビアの国民 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6334">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6335">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6335">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6336">10 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6336">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6337">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6337">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6338">10 桁の連続する数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6338">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6339">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6339">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6340">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6340">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6341">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6341">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6342">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6342">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6343">正規表現 Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6343">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6344">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6344">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6345">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6345">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6346">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6346">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6347">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6347">Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6348">I card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6348">I card number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6349">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6349">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6350">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6350">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6351">シンガポールの米国登録 id カード (NRIC) 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6351">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6352">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6352">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6353">9 桁の文字と数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6353">Nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6354">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6354">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6355">9 桁の文字と数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6355">Nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6356">文字「F」、「G」、「S」、または「T」 (大文字小文字の区別なし) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6356">The letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6357">7 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6357">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6358">1 桁のアルファベットのチェック ディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6358">An alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6359">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6360">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6360">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6361">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6362">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6362">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6363">正規表現 Regex_singapore_nric は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6363">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6364">Keyword_singapore_nric からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6364">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6365">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6365">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6366">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6366">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6367">正規表現 Regex_singapore_nric は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6367">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6368">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6368">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6379">スロバキアドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6379">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6380">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6380">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6381">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6381">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6382">1文字の後に7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6382">One character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6383">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6383">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6384">1文字の後に7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6384">One character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6385">1文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない) または数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6385">One letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6386">7 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6386">Seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6387">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6387">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6388">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6388">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6389">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6389">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6390">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6390">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6391">正規表現は、 `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6391">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6392">From キーワード `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6392">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovaknia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6393">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6393">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6394">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6394">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6395">dl # driver license driver ライセンス番号ドライバーライセンスドライバー lic。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6395">dl# driver license driver license number driver licence drivers lic.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6396">drivers license drivers ライセンスドライバーのライセンスドライバーのライセンスドライバーのライセンス番号運転免許証番号 (# vodičský preukaz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6396">drivers license drivers licence driver's license driver's license number driver's licence number driving license number dlno# vodičský preukaz</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6397">スロバキア国立識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6397">Slovakia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6398">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6398">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6399">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6399">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6400">1つの円記号を含む10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6400">Ten digits containing one backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6401">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6401">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6402">1つの円記号を含む10桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6402">Ten digits containing one backslash:</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6403">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6403">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6404">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6404">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6405">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6405">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6406">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6406">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6407">関数は、 `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6407">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6408">From キーワード `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6408">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6409">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6409">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6410">関数は、 `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6410">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovakia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6457">スロバキアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6457">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6458">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6458">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6459">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6459">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6460">1つの数字または文字の後に7桁の数字 (スペースまたは区切り記号なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6460">One digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6461">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6461">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6462">1桁の数字または文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない) の後に7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6462">One digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6463">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6463">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6464">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6464">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6465">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6465">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6466">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6466">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6467">正規表現は、 `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6467">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6468">From キーワード `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6468">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6469">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6469">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6470">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6470">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6471">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6471">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6472">スロバキアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6472">slovakian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6473">passport いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6473">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6474">číslo/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6474">číslo pasu</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6475">スロバキアの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6475">Slovakia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6476">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務識別番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6476">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6477">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6477">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6478">スペースまたは区切り文字を含まない10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6478">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6479">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6479">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6480">10 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6480">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6481">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6481">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6482">該当しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6482">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6483">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6483">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6484">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6484">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6485">正規表現は、 `Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6485">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6486">From キーワード `Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6486">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6533">スロベニアドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6533">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6534">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6534">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6535">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6535">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6536">スペースと区切り文字を含まない9桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6536">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6537">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6537">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6538">9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6538">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6539">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6539">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6540">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6540">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6541">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6541">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6542">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6542">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6543">正規表現は、 `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6543">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6544">From キーワード `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6544">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6545">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6545">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6556">ドライバーのライセンス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6556">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6557">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6557">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6558">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6558">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6559">vozniško dovoljenje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6559">vozniško dovoljenje</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6560">スロベニアの国の識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6560">Slovenia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6561">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6561">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6562">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6562">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6563">13桁の数字、スペースまたは区切り記号なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6563">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6564">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6564">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6565">指定したパターンの13桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6565">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6566">誕生日 (DDMMLLL) に対応する7桁の数字で、"LLL" は誕生年の最後の3桁に対応します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6566">Seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6567">誕生日の範囲に対応する2桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6567">Two digits that correspond to the area of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6568">同じ日に生まれた人物の性別とシリアル番号の組み合わせに対応する3つの数字 (女性の場合は男性と500-999 は 000-499)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6568">Three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6569">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6569">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6570">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6570">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6571">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6571">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6572">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6572">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6573">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6573">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6574">関数は、 `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6574">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6575">From キーワード `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6575">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6576">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6576">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6577">関数は、 `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6577">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovenia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6605">スロベニアのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6605">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6606">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6606">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6607">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6607">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6608">2つの文字の後に、スペースや区切り文字を含まない7桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6608">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6609">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6609">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6610">2つの文字の後に7桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6610">Two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6611">文字 "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6611">The letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6612">1文字の大文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6612">One uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6613">7 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6613">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6614">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6614">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6615">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6615">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6616">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6616">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6617">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6617">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6618">正規表現は、 `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6618">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6619">From キーワード `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6619">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6620">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6620">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6621">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6621">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6622">パスポート番号スロベニア語パスポート番号パスポート no številka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6622">passport number slovenian passport number passport no številka potnega lista</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6623">スロベニアの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6623">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6624">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務識別番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6624">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6625">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6625">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6626">スペースまたは区切り文字を含まない8桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6626">Eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6627">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6627">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6628">8 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6628">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6629">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6629">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6630">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6630">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6631">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6631">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6632">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6632">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6633">関数は、 `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6633">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6634">From キーワード `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6634">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6635">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6635">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6636">関数は、 `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6636">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6637">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6637">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6638">Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6638">Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6639">davčna številka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6639">davčna številka</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6640">identifikacijska številka davka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6640">identifikacijska številka davka</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6641">številka davčne datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6641">številka davčne datoteke</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6642">税ファイル番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6642">tax file no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6644">tax id
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6644">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6645">税 id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6645">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6646">税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6646">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6647">課税番号#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6647">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6648">課税番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6648">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6649">課税番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6649">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6650">税務登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6650">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6651">taxid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6651">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6652">taxidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6652">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6653">taxidnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6653">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6654">taxno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6654">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6655">taxnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6655">taxnumber#</span></span>

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6660">南アフリカの識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6660">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6661">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6662">省略可能なスペースを含む 13 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6662">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6663">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6664">13 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6664">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6665">YYMMDD の形式の生年月日を表す 6 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6665">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6666">4 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6666">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6667">1 桁の市民標識 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6667">A single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6668">数字「8」または「9」 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6668">The digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6669">チェックサム ディジットとして機能する 1 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6669">One digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6670">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6671">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6671">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6672">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6673">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6673">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6674">関数 Func_south_africa_identification_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6674">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6675">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6675">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6676">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6676">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6677">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6677">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6678">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6678">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6679">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6679">Identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6680">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6680">ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6681">Fim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6681">Identification</span></span> 
   
## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6682">南韓国の常駐登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6682">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6683">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6684">ハイフンを 1 つ含む 13 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6684">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6685">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6686">13 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6686">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6687">YYMMDD の形式の生年月日を表す 6 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6687">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6688">ハイフン 1 つ </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6688">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6689">世紀と性別によって決まる 1 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6689">One digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6690">4 桁の出生地域コード </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6690">Four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6691">先頭の番号が同一である人々を区別するための 1 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6691">One digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6692">1 桁のチェック ディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6692">A check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6693">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6693">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6694">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6694">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6695">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6695">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6696">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6696">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6697">関数 Func_south_korea_resident_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6697">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6698">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6698">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6699">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6699">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6700">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6700">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6701">関数 Func_south_korea_resident_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6701">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6702">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6702">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6703">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6703">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6704">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6704">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6705">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6705">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6706">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6706">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6707">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6707">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6708">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6708">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6709">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6709">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6710">スペインの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6710">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6711">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6711">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6712">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6712">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6713">8桁の数字の後に1つの文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6713">Eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6714">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6714">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6715">8桁の数字の後に1文字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6715">Eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6716">8 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6716">Eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6717">1桁の数字または文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6717">One digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6718">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6718">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6719">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6719">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6720">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6720">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6721">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6721">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6722">関数は、 `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6722">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6723">From キーワード `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6723">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6724">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6724">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6725">**Keywords_spain_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6725">**Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6743">ライセンス番号の運転</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6743">driving licence number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6751">número carnet conducir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6751">número carnet conducir</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6752">/暗号化 ia conducir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6752">licencia conducir</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6753">número de permiso de conducir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6753">número de permiso de conducir</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6754">número de permiso conducir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6754">número de permiso conducir</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6755">número permiso conducir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6755">número permiso conducir</span></span>

## <a name="spain-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6760">スペインの米国の識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6760">Spain national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6761">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6761">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6762">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6762">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6763">7桁の数字の後に1文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6763">Seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6764">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6764">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6765">7桁の数字の後に1文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6765">Seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6766">7 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6766">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6767">1桁の数字または文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6767">One digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6768">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6768">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6769">該当しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6769">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6770">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6770">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6771">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6771">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6772">正規表現は、 `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6772">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6773">From キーワード `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6773">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Spain national identification number -->
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6781">dad único の識別子</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6781">identidad único</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6785">国民 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6785">national identity</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6792">número nacional 識別子 dad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6792">número nacional identidad</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6793">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6793">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6794">個人 id いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6794">personal identity no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6795">一意の id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6795">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6796">見つから#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6796">uniqueid#</span></span>

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6797">スペインのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6797">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6798">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6798">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6799">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6799">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6800">スペースまたは区切り記号を含まない、文字と数字の8文字または9文字の組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6800">An eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6801">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6801">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6802">文字と数字の8文字または9文字の組み合わせ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6802">An eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6803">2桁の数字または文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6803">Two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6804">1桁の数字または文字 (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6804">One digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6805">6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6805">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6806">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6806">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6807">該当しない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6807">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6808">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6808">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6809">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6809">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6810">正規表現は、 `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6810">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6811">From キーワード `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6811">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6812">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6812">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6813">**Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6813">**Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6814">サインアウト</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6814">passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6815">スペインのパスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6815">spain passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6816">パスポートブック</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6816">passport book</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6817">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6817">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6818">passport いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6818">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6819">libreta pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6819">libreta pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6820">número pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6820">número pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6821">españ a pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6821">españa pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6822">pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6822">pasaporte</span></span>


## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6823">スペインの社会保障番号 (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6823">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6824">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 社会保障番号または同等の ID 機密情報の種類に含まれており、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6824">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6825">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6826">11 ～ 12 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6826">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6827">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6828">11-12 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6828">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6829">2 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6829">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6830">スラッシュ (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6830">A forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6831">7 ～ 8 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6831">7-8 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6832">スラッシュ (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6832">A forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6833">2 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6833">Two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6834">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6834">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6835">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6835">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6836">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6836">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6837">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6837">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6838">関数 Func_spanish_social_security_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6838">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6839">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6839">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6840">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6840">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6841">なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6841">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6842">スペインの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6842">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6843">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務識別番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6843">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6844">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6844">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6845">7桁または8桁の数字と、指定したパターンの1文字または2文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6845">Seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6846">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6846">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6847">スペインの国民 Id カードを持つスペインの自然の人物:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6847">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6848">8 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6848">Eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6849">1つの大文字 (大文字と小文字を区別)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6849">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6850">スペインの国民 Id カードを持たない非常駐 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6850">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6851">1つの大文字の "L" (大文字と小文字を区別する)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6851">One uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6852">7 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6852">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6853">1つの大文字 (大文字と小文字を区別)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6853">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6854">Spaniards は、次のようにします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6854">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6855">1つの大文字の "K" (大文字と小文字を区別)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6855">One uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6856">7 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6856">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6857">1つの大文字 (大文字と小文字を区別)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6857">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6858">Foreigner の Id 番号を持つ Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6858">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6859">"X"、"Y"、または "Z" (大文字と小文字を区別) の1つの大文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6859">One uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6860">7 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6860">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6861">1つの大文字 (大文字と小文字を区別)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6861">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6862">Foreigner の識別番号のない Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6862">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6863">1つの大文字の "M" (大文字と小文字を区別する)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6863">One uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6864">7 桁の数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6864">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6865">1つの大文字 (大文字と小文字を区別)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6865">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6866">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6867">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6867">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6868">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6869">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6869">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6870">関数は、 `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6870">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6871">From キーワード `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6871">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6872">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6872">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6873">関数は、 `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6873">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
