## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6904">SQL Server の接続文字列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6904">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6905">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6905">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6906">文字列 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid"、または "UserId" の後に、次のパターンで概説されている文字と文字列が続きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6906">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6907">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6907">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6908">文字列 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid"、または "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6908">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6909">1-200 の小文字または大文字、数字、記号、特殊文字、スペースのいずれかの組み合わせ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6909">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6910">文字列 "Password" または "pwd" ("pwd" の前に小文字が含まれていません)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6910">The string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6911">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6911">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6912">ドル記号 ($)、パーセント記号 (%)、不等号 (>)、記号 (@)、二重引用符 (")、セミコロン (;)、左中かっこ ([)、左かっこ ({) のいずれでもない文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6912">Any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6913">セミコロンではない7-128 文字の任意の組み合わせ (;)、スラッシュ (/)、または引用符 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6913">Any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6914">セミコロン (;)または二重引用符 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6914">A semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6915">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6915">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6916">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6916">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6917">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6917">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6918">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6918">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6919">正規表現 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6919">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6920">CEP_GlobalFilter からのキーワードが見つかり**ません**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6920">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6921">正規表現 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出し**ません**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6921">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6922">正規表現 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出し**ません**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6922">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6923">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6923">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6924">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6924">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6925">パスワードの一部</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6925">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6926">パスワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6926">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6927">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6927">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6928">示す</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6928">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6929">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6929">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6930">(この機密情報の種類では、キーワードリストではなく正規表現を使用してこれらのキーワードを識別していることに注意してください)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6930">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6931">Password または pwd の後に、0-2 スペース、等号 (=)、0-2 スペース、アスタリスク (\*)、または--</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6931">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6932">Password または pwd の後に、次のように入力します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6932">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6933">等号 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6933">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6934">不等号 (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6934">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6935">1-200 文字の大文字と小文字、数字、アスタリスク (\*)、ハイフン (-)、下線 (_)、または空白文字の任意の組み合わせ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6935">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6936">不等号 (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6936">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6937">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6937">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6938">(この機密情報の種類では、キーワードリストではなく正規表現を使用してこれらのキーワードを識別していることに注意してください)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6938">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6939">拠点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6939">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6940">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6940">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6941">ノース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6941">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6942">サンド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6942">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6943">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6943">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6944">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6944">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6945">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6945">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6946">testacs。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6946">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6947">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6947">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6948">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6948">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6949">ネット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6949">net</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6950">スウェーデンの運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6950">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6951">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6951">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6952">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6952">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6953">10桁の数字 (ハイフンを含む)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6953">Ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6954">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6954">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6955">ハイフンを含む10桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6955">Ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6956">6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6956">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6957">ハイフン 1 つ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6957">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6958">4 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6958">Four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6959">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6959">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6960">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6960">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6961">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6961">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6962">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6962">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6963">正規表現は、 `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6963">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6964">From キーワード `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6964">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6980">スウェーデンの国民 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6980">Sweden National ID</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6981">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立 Id 番号の機密情報の種類に含まれており、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6981">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6982">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6982">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6983">10 桁または 12 桁の数字とオプションの区切り記号 1 つ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6983">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6984">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6984">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6985">10 桁または 12 桁の数字と省略可能な区切り記号:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6985">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6986">2 ～ 4 桁の数字 (省略可能)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6986">2-4 digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6987">YYMMDD という日付形式の 6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6987">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6988">区切り文字「-」または「+」(省略可能)、および</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6988">Delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional), plus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6989">4 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6989">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6990">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6990">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6991">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6991">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6992">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6992">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6993">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6993">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6994">関数 Func_swedish_national_identifier がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6994">The function Func_swedish_national_identifier finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6995">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6995">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden National ID -->
<Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6996">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6996">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6997">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6997">No</span></span>
   
## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6998">スウェーデンのパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6998">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-6999">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU のパスポート番号機密情報の種類に含まれており、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-6999">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7000">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7000">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7001">8 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7001">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7002">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7002">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7003">8 桁の連続する数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7003">Eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7004">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7005">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7005">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7006">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7007">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7007">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7008">正規表現 Regex_sweden_passport_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7008">The regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7009">次のいずれかの条件に該当する:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7009">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7010">Keyword_passport のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7010">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7011">Keyword_sweden_passport のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7011">A keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7042">スウェーデンの社会保障番号または同等の id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7042">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7043">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 社会保障番号または同等の ID の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7043">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7044">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7044">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7045">12桁の数字 (スペースと区切り記号なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7045">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7046">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7046">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7047">12 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7047">12 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7048">誕生日に対応する8桁の数字 (YYYYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7048">Eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7049">次の場合、シリアル番号に対応する3桁の数字です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7049">Three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7050">シリアル番号の最後の桁は、男性の場合は奇数、女性の場合は偶数の数字を指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7050">The last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7051">1990までの間、シリアル番号の corresponded を郡に割り当てます。これは、年1月 1947 1 日に税務レコードに従って、(通常は7番目の数字) を指定することによって、番号のベアラーが入社したか (1947 以前に作成された場合)、immigrants のための特別なコードになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7051">Up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7052">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7052">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7053">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7053">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7054">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7054">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7055">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7055">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7056">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7056">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7057">関数は、 `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7057">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7058">From キーワード `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7058">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7059">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7059">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7060">関数は、 `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7060">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7061">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7061">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7062">Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7062">Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7063">個人 id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7063">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7064">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7064">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7065">個人 id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7065">personal id no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7066">id 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7066">identity no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7067">識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7067">identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7068">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7068">personal identification no</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7076">スウェーデンの税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7076">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7077">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務識別番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7077">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7078">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7078">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7079">指定したパターンの10桁の数字と記号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7079">Ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7080">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7080">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7081">10桁の数字と記号:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7081">Ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7082">誕生日に対応する6桁の数字 (YYMMDD という)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7082">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7083">プラス記号、マイナス記号、または円記号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7083">A plus sign, minus sign, or backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7084">識別番号を一意にするための3桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7084">Three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7085">1990より前に発行された番号については、7桁目と8桁目の数字は、誕生日または外国出身の人物を識別します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7085">For numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7086">9桁の数字は、男性に対して、または女性に対して、性別を示します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7086">The digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7087">1つのチェックディジット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7087">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7088">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7088">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7089">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7089">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7090">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7090">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7091">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7091">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7092">関数は、 `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7092">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7093">From キーワード `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7093">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7094">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7094">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7095">関数は、 `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7095">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7121">SWIFT コード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7121">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7122">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7122">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7123">4 桁の文字の後に 5 ～ 31 桁の文字または数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7123">Four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7124">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7124">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7125">4 文字の後に 5 ～ 31 個の文字または数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7125">Four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7126">4 文字の銀行コード (大文字小文字を区別しない)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7126">Four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7127">省略可能なスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7127">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7128">4 ～ 28 個の文字または数字 (基本的銀行口座番号 (BBAN))</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7128">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7129">省略可能なスペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7129">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7130">1 ～ 3 個の文字または数字 (BBAN の残りの部分)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7130">1-3 letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7131">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7131">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7132">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7132">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7133">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7133">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7134">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7134">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7135">正規表現 Regex_swift がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7135">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7136">Keyword_swift のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7136">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7170">台湾国立識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7170">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7171">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7172">1 桁の文字 (アルファベット) の後に 9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7172">One letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7173">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7174">1 文字 の後に 9 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7174">One letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7175">1 桁の文字 (アルファベット、大文字小文字の区別なし)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7175">One letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7176">数字「1」または「2」</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7176">The digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7177">8 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7177">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7178">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7178">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7179">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7179">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7180">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7180">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7181">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7181">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7182">関数 Func_taiwanese_national_id がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7182">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7183">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7183">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7184">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7184">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7185">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7185">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7186">関数 Func_taiwanese_national_id がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7186">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7187">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7187">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7193">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7193">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7194">身分證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7194">身分證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7195">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7195">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7196">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7196">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7197">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7197">身份證號</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7199">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7199">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7200">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7200">簽名</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7204">台湾のパスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7204">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7205">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7205">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7206">バイオメトリックパスポート番号: 9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7206">Biometric passport number: Nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7207">バイオメトリクスでないパスポート番号: 9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7207">Non-biometric passport number: Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7208">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7208">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7209">バイオメトリックパスポート番号:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7209">Biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7210">数字「3」 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7210">The digit "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7211">8 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7211">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7212">バイオメトリクスではないパスポート番号:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7212">Non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7213">9 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7213">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7214">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7215">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7215">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7216">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7217">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7217">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7218">正規表現 Regex_taiwan_passport は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7218">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7219">Keyword_taiwan_passport からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7219">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7220">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7220">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7221">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7221">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7222">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7222">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7223">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7223">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7224">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7224">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7225">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7225">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7226">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7226">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7227">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7227">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7228">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7228">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7229">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7229">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7230">台湾の常駐証明書 (ARC/TARC) 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7230">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7231">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7231">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7232">10 桁の文字と数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7232">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7233">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7233">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7234">10 桁の文字と数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7234">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7235">2 桁の文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7235">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7236">8 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7236">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7237">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7237">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7238">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7238">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7239">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7239">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7240">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7240">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7241">正規表現 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7241">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7242">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7242">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7243">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7243">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7244">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7244">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7245">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7245">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7246">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7246">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7247">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7247">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7248">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7248">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7249">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7249">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7250">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7250">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7251">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7251">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7252">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7252">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7253">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7253">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7254">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7254">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7255">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7255">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7256">タイ語の母集団識別コード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7256">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7257">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7257">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7258">13 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7258">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7259">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7259">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7260">13 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7260">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7261">最初の桁が0または9ではない</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7261">First digit is not 0 or 9</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7262">12 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7262">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7263">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7263">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7264">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7264">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7265">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7265">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7266">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7266">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7267">関数 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7267">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7268">Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7268">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7269">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7269">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7270">関数 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7270">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7271">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7271">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7272">Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7272">Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7273">ID 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7273">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7274">識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7274">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7275">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7275">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7276">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7276">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7277">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7277">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7278">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7278">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7279">トルコの国の識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7279">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7280">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7280">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7281">11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7281">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7282">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7282">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7283">11 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7283">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7284">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7284">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7285">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7285">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7286">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7286">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7287">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7287">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7288">関数 Func_Turkish_National_Id は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7288">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7289">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id からのキーワードが見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7289">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7290">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7290">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7291">関数 Func_Turkish_National_Id は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7291">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7292">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7292">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7293">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7293">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7294">TC Kimlik No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7294">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7295">TC Kimlik numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7295">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7296">Vatandaşlık numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7296">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7297">Vatandaşlık no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7297">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7298">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7298">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7299">運転免許証番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7299">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7300">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU ドライバーのライセンス番号の機密情報の種類に含まれており、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7300">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7301">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7301">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7302">指定の形式で組み合わせた 18 桁の文字と数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7302">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7303">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7303">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7304">18 個の文字と数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7304">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7305">5 文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない) または数字「9」(1 文字の代わり)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7305">Five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7306">1 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7306">One digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7307">誕生日の日付形式 MMDDY の5桁の数字 (7 文字目は、driver が女性の場合は50にインクリメントされます。つまり、01から12の代わりに51から 62)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7307">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7308">2 文字 (大文字小文字を区別しない) または数字「9」(1 文字の代わり)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7308">Two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7309">5 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7309">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7310">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7310">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7311">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7311">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7312">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7312">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7313">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7313">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7314">関数 Func_uk_drivers_license がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7314">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7315">Keyword_uk_drivers_license のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7315">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7316">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7316">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7325">tricycles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7325">tricycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7326">motorcycles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7326">motorcycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7327">photocard licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7327">photocard licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7331">driving licences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7331">driving licences</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7332">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7332">driving licence</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7333">dual control car</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7333">dual control car</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7334">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7334">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7335">electoral ロール番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7335">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7336">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7336">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7337">2 桁の文字の後に 1 ～ 4 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7337">Two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7338">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7338">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7339">2 桁の文字 (大文字小文字の区別なし) の後に 1 ～ 4 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7339">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7340">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7340">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7341">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7341">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7342">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7342">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7343">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7343">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7344">正規表現 Regex_uk_electoral がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7344">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7345">Keyword_uk_electoral のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7345">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7346">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7346">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7347">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7347">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7349">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7349">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7350">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7350">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7351">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7351">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7352">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7352">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7353">米国の医療サービス番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7353">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7354">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7354">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7355">スペースで区切られた 10 ～ 17 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7355">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7356">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7356">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7357">10 ～ 17 桁の数字:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7357">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7358">3 桁または 10 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7358">Either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7359">スペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7359">A space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7360">3 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7360">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7361">スペース</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7361">A space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7362">4 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7362">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7363">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7363">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7364">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7364">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7365">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7365">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7366">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7366">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7367">関数 Func_uk_nhs_number がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7367">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7368">次のいずれかの条件に該当する:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7368">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7369">Keyword_uk_nhs_number のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7369">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7370">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7370">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7371">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7371">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7372">チェックサムが渡される。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7372">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7373">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7373">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7374">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7374">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7375">national health service</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7375">national health service</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7376">nhs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7376">nhs</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7377">health services authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7377">health services authority</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7378">health authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7378">health authority</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number1"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7379">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7379">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7380">patient id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7380">patient id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7381">patient identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7381">patient identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7382">patient no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7382">patient no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7383">patient number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7383">patient number</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7384">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7384">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7385">GP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7385">GP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7386">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7386">DOB</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7387">D.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7387">D.O.B</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7388">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7388">Date of Birth</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7390">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7390">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7391">国家保険番号 (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7391">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7392">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 国立識別子の機密情報の種類に含まれており、スタンドアロンの機密情報の種類エンティティとして使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7392">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7393">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7393">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7394">スペースまたはダッシュで区切られた7文字または9文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7394">7 characters or 9 characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7395">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7395">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7396">次の2つのパターンを使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7396">Two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7397">2文字 (有効な NINOs このプレフィックスには特定の文字のみを使用します。このパターンは、大文字小文字を区別しません)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7397">Two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7398">6 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7398">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7399">「A」、「B」、「C」、または「d」 (プレフィックスと同様に、サフィックスには特定の文字のみ指定できます。大文字と小文字は区別されません)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7399">Either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7400">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7400">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7401">2文字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7401">Two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7402">スペースまたはダッシュ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7402">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7403">2 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7403">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7404">スペースまたはダッシュ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7404">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7405">2 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7405">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7406">スペースまたはダッシュ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7406">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7407">2 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7407">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7408">スペースまたはダッシュ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7408">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7409">' A '、' B '、' C '、または ' d ' のどちらか</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7409">Either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7410">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7410">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7411">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7411">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7412">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7412">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7413">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、85% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7413">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7414">関数 Func_uk_nino がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7414">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7415">Keyword_uk_nino のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7415">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7416">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7416">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7417">関数 Func_uk_nino がパターンに一致するコンテンツを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7417">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7418">Keyword_uk_nino のキーワードを検出しなかった。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7418">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7433">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7433">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7434">税識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7434">tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7435">この機密情報の種類エンティティは、EU 税務識別番号の機密情報の種類でのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7435">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7436">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7436">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7437">Unique 納税リファレンス (UTR): スペースと区切り文字を含まない10桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7437">Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7438">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7438">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7439">Unique 納税リファレンス (UTR):10 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7439">Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits</span></span>

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7440">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7440">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7441">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7441">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7442">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7442">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7443">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7443">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7444">関数は、 `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` パターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7444">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7445">From キーワード `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` が見つかりました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7445">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7465">米国の銀行口座番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7465">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7466">フォーマット</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7466">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7467">8 ～ 17 桁の数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7467">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7468">パターン</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7468">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7469">8 ～ 17 桁の連続する数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7469">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7470">チェックサム</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7470">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7471">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7471">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7472">定義</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7472">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7473">DLP ポリシーは、抽出した約 300 文字が次の条件に該当することを検出した場合に、75% の確証を持ってそれがこの種類の機密情報であると特定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7473">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7474">正規表現 Regex_usa_bank_account_number は、このパターンに一致するコンテンツを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7474">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7475">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account のキーワードを検出した。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7475">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7476">キーワード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7476">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_usa_bank_account"></a><span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7477">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7477">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="3cf57-7485">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3cf57-7485">Bank Account Number</span></span>
